column3: Se kasa usi'nʉnkan nɨto' i'tu mɨrɨ: Sises Kʉrai uya tʉuko'manto' tʉrʉ'pʉ uiwano' kon pe. Mɨrɨ kasa uko'man nɨto' kon nonkato' pe iyesi mɨrɨ utonpa kon iwano' pe.

To' Epoi Itɨ'pʉ Weyu Rʉ'pʉ pɨ' e'nɨto' rawɨrɨ kuru rɨ, Sises uya i'tusa' esi'pʉ serɨ non nɨnto' tʉuya weyu e'seposa', ikʉipʉnʉ piya' si tʉutɨto'. Tiwano' ton pe te'san i'nʉnkakapʉ tʉpo, non po te'san, mɨrɨpan kon ena' nin si ipan pe to' i'nʉnkato' tʉuya enpoikakaa'pʉ iya.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨnʉ' yan pɨ' isakorota'pʉ 40 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya? Kamoro pen pe' imakoitasa' kon rɨmono' tau, itekepu pe ita'po'sa' kon?
Main awɨron kon mʉre amʉ' kasa, ɨri eseru i'sero' kon pe ke'tʉu, i'tu auya'nokon pʉra iyesi a'tai ɨwesi'pʉ kon kasa.
Apʉne pʉra Papa uya tanporo ka'pon amʉ' a'sisa' main awɨrɨ pʉra e'nɨto' ya', tanporo to' pɨ' tʉusentu'mato' pe.

Mɨrɨ a'tai, main waraino eta'pʉ uya kamoro asakɨrɨ'nan kon ene amʉ' koro'tau, “Aiko iten yai pʉrowa, tikin nan wʉi yau e'tʉrawasoman nɨsa' epe'pʉ pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ osorʉwau iten yai a'nai', pari tato' e'pasa' tikin nan wʉi yau e'tʉrawasoman nɨsa' epe'pʉ pe. E'tane karapa, are' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ waain kʉ'ma'tanʉkʉi!” tawon.
Mɨ pe te'ku'sen pe pʉra enatɨ' Itepuru rau, ayanʉnto' kon pe iya.

Apʉne pʉra tikin nɨ wʉi tʉweyu ku'sa' iya ka'pon amʉ' eseru aimenkato' tʉuya weyu pe, serɨ ku'ton ka'pon epoka'sa' Papa uya tiwano' pe ka'pon amʉ' uya apurɨto' pe. Papa uya tʉnanʉmʉ'pʉ enpoikasa' to' enu ya', i'mʉ'sa'ka tʉuya winɨ iyerikʉ'pʉ apai,” ta'pʉ Paarʉ uya.
Soisa amʉ' uya tikʉkenan e'mepɨtʉ'pʉ aro', kʉron pe, mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ'pʉ to' uya i'pai pona. To' uya ipontɨ'pʉ tʉtariren ya',
Mɨrɨ wenai, ama'non ton itaan'pʉ ima'tasa' rʉ'pʉ ton emari'makapʉ i'se esi, to' umu'tato' pe, tiwʉ' kon nɨrɨ mainanpanin nan pe to' e'to' pe, uyeyaton kon usaurokʉ upɨ'nokon ɨri pe temapu'tɨi' pʉra.
Uyapurɨtɨ', urɨ esi ikʉipʉnʉ yau, ikʉipʉnʉ esi uyau ta uya a'tai; mɨrɨ pe pʉra, eke Papa tʉrawasooi amʉ' kupʉ uya rɨ apurɨtɨ'.
Mɨrɨ tʉpo, eri'nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iyeri'sa' kon pata eno'ma'pʉ to' uya apo' ku'pɨri ka'. Serɨ apo' ku'pɨri esi iyakon ite'kwa pe eri'nɨto'.

Kʉrai rɨ nin uya e'ne' moronka nesii'no inke rɨ, non e'kaa'pʉ si'kɨrɨ rɨ. E'tane si isenpoikasa' tikin ite'kwa tʉnakonomaton pe pʉra rɨ nin, pata weyu u'matʉ a'tai makoi eno'ma pe tʉmɨrɨ ke tʉuse'ma ke.
Tʉmaimu awɨrɨ pʉra rɨ to' e'tane, to' nʉkupʉnʉ moronka pɨ' iyesi'pʉ 40 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya rɨmono' tau to' uko'mamʉ koro'tau.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', utonpa ton, enta'nase'na ayamʉrasa' kon a'tai, ɨtonpa kon enupɨkɨrɨ te'se e'tɨ'.

Mɨrɨ a'tai, karimeru mʉre uya 6 pe iku'nin a'si'sa' a'koka ene'pʉ uya. Mɨrɨ yau ɨsɨ pe tʉrʉ'pʉnʉ esi'pʉ. Wʉi enu ena'pʉ i'kʉrʉn pe, isa'ka'si atʉ kapirita i'po' ke ikonekasa' kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tanporo kapʉi ena'pʉ isuweyu pe mʉn kasa,

Uri'sami'si amʉ' uya iyeri'sa' kon tʉtonpa kon e'mʉ'sa'kasa' epopɨtʉ'pʉ. Tʉron kon kota'ma'pʉ ipan pe tʉnonka kon i'se pʉra to' esi pɨ', wakʉ te'mʉ'sa'kato' kon epoto' pe tʉuya'nokon te'san terikʉ kon tʉpo.

E'tane Paarʉ uya pʉresiman amʉ' maimu eikʉ'pʉ, “Ɨri ku'sa' ina uya pʉra rɨ iye'tane, soisa amʉ' uya anpisin koro'tau ina ari'po'pɨ'to' pe to' uya, to' auro'ka'pʉ! Roman amʉ' ina e'tane pariki'si ta' ina a'si'pʉ to' uya, mɨrɨpan kon esi ama'ai ina ennoko i'se. Kane! Tɨwɨ Roman amʉ' epuru ton nʉyepʉi ina enpa'kai',” ta'pʉ iya.

Apiyontɨn nɨto' ike ton, “Iyemari'masa' pe esii'ma kekumai,” “Ɨnʉ' rɨ kʉ'wɨnɨi,” “Ama' pe kesii,” “Ipan pe ɨtonpa iwano' i'se kesii,” mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨ'rɨ ton nɨ apiyontɨn nɨto' esi na'ne' amʉrasa' mɨrɨ se tikin nan iporo e'nɨto' yau: “Ɨtonpa i'nʉnkakɨ, mɨsi'nʉnkayai'ne' kasa rɨ,” tawon.
Tanporon kon serɨ kasa te'ku'san iyau ekorʉka wakʉ pe, ikasa kuru rɨ esuken.
Uyau Papa iwano' main pɨ' tepori'masen urɨ;
Pori' pe Itepuru yau e'tɨ' tɨwɨrɨ rɨ. Takapʉ uya kanan: Pori' pe e'tɨ'!
Era'tɨ'pʉ ɨnʉ' uya uyauro'ka tukai' ense'na. Era'tɨsa' a'tai, 7 kaisaron korʉ pun konekasa' raan'pu apon ton ene'pʉ uya.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨnʉ' yan pɨ' Papa uya usaurokʉ'pʉ to' ewonto' oton pen pɨ' tʉumoronka'to' kon ya' ta? Kamoro pen pe' imaimu awɨron kon nʉ'san pen?
Tanporo kamoro wapiya iye'sa' kon esi ama' e' ton, rapumanin nan pe nɨrɨ, e'tane karimeru amʉ' uya to' maimu eta pʉra iyesi'pʉ.

E'tʉtɨ', poitorʉ ton pʉrata ke te'masan pen, ɨyepuru kon ena', tanporon yau to' nama auya'nokon pe, kamoro wakʉ ton pe na'ne' nan mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusenuminkasan nɨken pen, e'tane kamoro ɨsɨ pe rɨ nɨrɨ ɨku'nin nan kon.

To' uya kasi pe rɨ Si'tipʉn eseru'tɨsa' tʉuya'nokon nʉ'pʉ ekama'pʉ Konsʉrʉ amʉ' pɨ'. “Iyereuta pʉra rɨ pʉse rɨ usauro'nɨ pɨ' man ɨri pe use'man nɨto', ɨpʉreman nɨto' iwʉ' pɨ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Main, Mosi' winon pɨ'.
Tanporo serɨ ton esi Papa winon pe, tʉwinɨkʉi' ukonekanin nʉ'pʉ kon Kʉrai poro mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉpokon pe tʉron kon konekato' pe utʉrawasooi kon ke urepasa' iya 'nokon;
Utonpa ton, tʉuseta'kai' pʉra e'nɨto' ento' ipɨ' ɨsɨ moronka a'taino pe, pu'kena' amʉ' entɨ', isauro'sa' kon Itepuru ese' yau.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Itepuru ekama'ponin nʉ'pʉ tʉpika'tɨnin pe, epika'tɨto' oton tasa' iya,’ ta'pʉ rʉ'pʉ Isowerʉ uya.
“Amen! Apurɨpɨ'to' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke pe iku'to', ipu'ketʉ, tenki tato', inamato', imeruntɨrʉ, ipana'pano nesii Papa iwano' pe tɨwɨrɨ rɨ. Amen!” ta'pʉ to' uya.
Ayama'nomʉ kon kʉse'nin kɨpo'po rɨ ɨye'rɨwʉntɨsa' kon winɨ, inse' ka'pɨ'sa' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ korʉ konekasa' rɨ ɨrɨwʉn kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wakʉ ton nɨ ɨpon kon pe.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', kɨpiyɨtʉi uyepuru kon ekama auya pɨ', mɨrɨ pe pʉra urɨ pɨ' ipɨkɨrɨ a'sisa' pe na'ne'. E'tane upokon pe e'nɨpai ekota'man yau itekare wenai, Papa meruntɨrʉ winɨ,
To' iwano' pe ekonekasa' wakʉ pe, to' nɨrɨ ekonekasa' e'to' pe wakʉ pe.
Apakatɨ', moro iye'ku'sa' na'ne' imeruntɨtanʉ'tɨ', eri'nɨ poken na'ne'. Eposa' uya man ɨnkupʉ'pʉ kon esi iyenuka'sa' pe pʉra Papa, itese' pɨ' e'to' enu yau.
To' osorʉwano rʉ'pʉ uya ti'sawʉ yawon i'kwamʉ'pʉ tʉu'tɨsen tuna ka' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ non yai tepa'kasen tuna pona'ne rɨ, mɨrɨpan ton era'tɨ'pʉ mʉn pe.
iporo epoto' eposa' apurɨto' winɨ serɨ eke nonkasa' iya' iyau e'mʉ'sa'kan nɨsa'nokon na'ne'. Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ epori'ma'nokon ipokon pe Papa ku'to' eke pe yau e'nɨ'nokon pɨ' e'ku'nɨto' yau.

Serɨ pɨ' i'nai rɨ e'tɨ': tekumasan, mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri kupʉ pɨ' te'san, mɨrɨ pe pʉra mentaino kon—esi ika'sa' apurɨpɨ'nin pe—esi pʉra iyesi Kʉrai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa e'to' esa' wannɨ pe epoton kon pe pʉra rɨ.
Apurɨto' winɨ Epʉra'an, tʉkɨ'masa' a'tai tʉutɨto' pe pata tʉpata'se' pe itʉton ya', uya apurɨ'pʉ mɨrɨpan utɨ'pʉ, mɨrɨ ya' utɨ tukai' i'tui'ma pʉra rɨ.
Waain pɨ' ke'taripatʉu, miyarɨ rɨ tʉuse'se'tɨi' pʉra rɨ e'pai ɨkupʉ iya 'nokon esi. E'tane ru'ku, Iya'kwarʉ ke atarʉ'tɨtɨ'.
Tu'kan kon uya rɨ piyɨ'nʉ'nin eseru ku'to' oton, mɨrɨpan kon uya i'napairon iyawɨrɨ e'nɨto' sapemato' oton.
Apʉne pʉra iporo asa'rɨ rɨ marɨ urɨ'nokon utɨto' e'ma esi Ikʉipʉnʉ piya' tikin nan Iya'kwarʉ winɨ.

Ina uya nin Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen enasa' Sises apurɨnin pe ena' imenukasa' man. Ina e'ku'sa' man ika'sa' ena' itʉsa' pɨ' to' enta'na namai', to' enta'na namai' mʉnʉ'pan nɨ o' pɨ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra erupatu'kasa' pɨ' rɨ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tekumasan pe to' esi namai',” ta'pʉ to' uya.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, Pi'ta uya ta'pʉ, “Ananayas, ɨ'rɨ pe iyesi pɨ' ɨri rɨ Se'tan ewonsa' ɨyewan ya', kasi pe rɨ Wakʉ A'kwarʉ enku'tɨ pa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itonpa rɨ kupʉ'pʉ esii'ma ɨpiyau?

Mɨrɨ a'tai mʉre' e'nɨ'nokon pen mɨrɨ, sipa'sipa nʉna'popɨtʉnʉ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ se airɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ mɨ airɨ ka'pon amʉ' uya enupan winɨ ennakanin nan a'setunʉ uya apɨ' nɨ enku'tɨnin teseru kon ke pen.

I'tu auya'nokon pʉra pe' iyesi ɨri ton uya Papa e'to' esa' wannɨ pe eporo pʉra iye'to' oton? Kɨsenku'tɨtʉu: Tekumasan, mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa tato' ipɨ' pe ika'sa' pɨ' tʉwɨpʉremasan, iyemari'masa' pe esii'ma tekumasan, warawoti'si amʉ', warawo' ku'nin nan tʉtaan'pʉ kon pe, tʉwaraino kon nɨ ku'nin nan tʉno'pʉ kon pe,
Amʉrapɨ'nɨto' eseru nonkapai'nokon pʉra, tʉron kon nʉnonkayai'ne' kasa, e'tane utonpa kon pori'mapɨ'pai'nokon—miyarɨ parɨ apʉne pʉra Iweyu e'seporo enkapʉ auya'nokon pɨ'.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', serɨ non eseru ton iwɨtɨ': ɨyekumato' kon, ipan pe wakʉ pe pʉra ɨwe'to' kon, ɨnɨkɨru kon, ɨri ɨnku'pai e'nɨto', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ mentai ɨwe'to' kon; mɨrɨ esi ika'sa' pɨ' papa ta kasa.

E'tane wʉi enawon pe e'nɨ'nokon wenai, uiwano' kon pe tʉuse'se'tɨi' e'nɨpai'nokon, apurɨto', i'nʉnkato' ya' tenai' upʉropo kon wapu pe te'sen kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ epika'tɨn tukai' e'ku'nɨto' uyarʉkooi kon pe te'sen kasa.
Apʉne pʉra Papa uya enari'ke' a'kwarʉ wannɨ ke repan nɨsa' pen, e'tane meruntɨ a'kwarʉ wannɨ ke, tʉusi'nʉnkasen mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tiwa rɨ tepanamasen.
Kʉrɨ rɨ i'tu uya tawon pe esii'ma, apiyontɨn nɨto' iya awɨrɨ pʉra na'ne' esi mɨrɨ kasi ye' pe, i'napairon pʉra rɨ iyesi iyau.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ipan pe ɨyekama'po uya 'nokon mararon pe pʉra pori' pe uku'tɨ' ɨsi'kaisa rɨ tʉusenuminkai', tʉusi'nʉnkai' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tikin nɨ iya'kwarʉ, tikin nɨ isenuminkato' te'se.
Mɨrɨpan a'si i'se to' esi'pʉ, mɨrɨ e'tane ɨnʉ' uya rɨ a'pɨ'pɨtʉ'pʉ pen nɨ, apʉne pʉra iweyu e'seposa' pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi'pʉ.
Wakʉ ku'to' pe to' uya to' apiyontɨ', wakʉ to' nʉkupʉnʉ yau eke pe to' uya iku'to' pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ amʉre'mʉra to' e'to' pe ɨsekanpai te'sen ye' pe.
To' uya imaimu eikʉ'pʉ, “Ɨri ku'sa' iya pʉra iyesi yau, ina nʉnepʉi'no pen ɨyena',” ta'pʉ to' uya.

Kʉrɨ eke pe kuru tikin nan wʉi esi nɨkayai'ne' uya ikupʉ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano' pe. Kʉrɨ o' anyai'ne' uya anɨ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano' pe, apʉne pʉra Papa pɨ' tenki ta iya ke; mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kʉrɨ anɨ iya pʉra na'ne' uya ikupʉ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano' pe, mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta Papa pɨ'.
Pori' pe e'ku'nɨto' yau, ɨsɨ yau e'nɨ moronkanin pe e'tɨ', ɨpʉreman yau te'nonkasen pe pʉra.
Soisa amʉ' esa' apiyo'ma'pʉ iya, “Paarʉ erasunpanin pe, tewa ke pʉra Paarʉ iku'kɨ, itonpa ton uya rɨ Paarʉ mainanpato' pe i'se iye'to' rɨ ne'to' pe to' uya iku'kɨ,” ta'pʉ iya.
Wapu'tɨnin ye' rɨ, apurɨnin ye' rɨ, te'ku'sen ye' rɨ, miyarɨ rɨ iku'nin ye'.
Iye'menukasa': “Apurɨsa' uya; mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', usauro'sa',” tukai'. Mɨrɨ rɨ apurɨto' iya'kwarʉ pe ina uya rɨ marɨ apurɨ, mɨrɨ pɨ' ina usaurokʉ,
Ina tonpa ton, ina uya ɨyekama'pokapʉ kon, emiya'ne' pe te'san ipanamaka'tɨ', enari'ke' te'san enari'mʉnkaka'tɨ', ɨ'sɨ'mʉra te'san ipika'tɨka'tɨ', kɨseta'katʉu tanporon kon pɨ'.
5 pe to' ku'nin inserʉ uya ti'sawʉ yawon i'kwamʉ'pʉ ene apon pona. Ewarupɨ pe itesa' pe iye'to' ena'pʉ. Ka'pon amʉ' uya tani kon i'kapɨtʉ'pʉ, apʉne pʉra e'ne' pe tesi kon pɨ'.
Tʉusewankamai' pʉra e'nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨsentu'ke' pe e'nɨto' esi tanporo serɨ iporo e'nɨto' iyawɨrɨ te'san pona kan pe, kamo rɨ nɨrɨ Papa iwano' ton nɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pona.

Papa eseru awɨrɨ kuru enupasa' pe iyesi'pʉ. Pana' pe kuru nɨrɨ tʉusauro'sen pe iyesi'pʉ, iye'to' poro kuru Itepuru Sises eseru pɨ' enupanin pe kuru nɨrɨ iyesi'pʉ. Isaan Pa'tes ekareei epa'taisiman tawon nɨken i'tunin pe iyesi'pʉ.
Mɨrɨ pɨ' ɨyenta'na pe rɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ensi auya rɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ'rɨ rɨ kupʉ auya pe iyesi pɨ', iku'kɨ eke pe Papa ku'pɨtʉ auya pe.

Tɨwɨ Wakʉ A'kwarʉ ɨneporo'pʉ kon nʉko'mamʉi ayau'nokon, ɨnʉ' rɨ ɨyenupanin kon i'se pʉra ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ. Iya'kwarʉ uya ɨyenupasa' kon na'ne' tanporon pɨ' rɨ, i'napai rɨ iyesi, enku'tɨnin pe pʉra—ɨyenupasa' iya 'nokon na'ne' kasa rɨ, iyau rɨ ɨko'mantɨ'.
Pun, iya'kwarʉ pʉn esi iyeri'sa' pe kasa, apurɨto' tʉku'sen a'kɨrɨ pʉra esi iyeri'sa' pe rɨ.
Serɨ ta'pʉ tʉuya tʉpo, tʉyu anʉmʉ'pʉ iya, tenki ta'pʉ iya Papa pɨ', mɨrɨpan pɨ' iyenta'na'pʉ tanporon kon enu airɨ.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ' to' ena' imenukapai'nokon, to' auro'kapai'nokon ɨri kiyari ika'sa' ena' itʉsa' pɨ' to' enta'na namai'; tekumai' makoi tʉku'se pʉra to' e'to' pe; terupatu'kai' iwɨsa' o' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ mʉnʉ'pan pɨ' to' enta'na namai'.

Mɨrɨ tʉpo, Paarʉ uya ta'pʉ Ananayas pɨ', “Papa uya ɨkota'ma mɨrɨ, wakʉ pe tʉusensen, mɨrɨ ku'sa' auya pɨ'. Main, Mosi' winon awɨrɨ mɨrɨ airɨ ɨyereutasa' uya uyekama'popɨtʉ, e'tane iyawɨrɨ pʉra ɨwesi, ka'pon amʉ' mapiyo'mayai'ne' to' uya unta'mopɨ'to' pe,” ta'pʉ iya.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', kamoro Kʉrai Sises yau na'ne' nan eno'mato' pʉra iyesi serɨ pe,
Apʉne pʉra Papa uya uyanʉnsa' kon pen kota'man nɨto' kon pe tʉuya, e'tane epika'tɨn nɨto' eponin pe uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai poro.

mɨrɨpan utɨto' oton tʉpataron kon ka'pon amʉ' Kokʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Makokʉ amʉ' enku'tɨse'na—asakɨrɨ'nan non ekun yawon kon. To' amʉranʉ'to' iya oton ɨsewa'nomase'na, anpisin pe parau e'pi pon wɨ'sɨ' esi kasa.

Mɨrɨ ye' pe ɨtonpa kon amʉ' esi'pʉ. E'tane si ɨkorʉkasa' kon, wakʉ pe ɨkonekasa' kon Papa iwano' pe, Papa pokon pe iyekonekasa' pe ipokena' pe, Itepuru Sises Kʉrai ese' yau, Papa, itese' pɨ' e'nɨto' A'kwarʉ ke.
Mɨrɨ wenai ekota'ma e'ai'ne' kasa. Mɨrɨ e'tane ɨpiyɨtʉ pen, apʉne pʉra i'tu uya unapurɨ'pʉ, mɨrɨpan esi tena' unnonka'pʉ mɨrɨ Itepuru uyepʉ weyu a'taino erasu pe tukai' i'tu uya.

Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨpʉrematɨ' Iya'kwarʉ yau tanporo te'ku'sen a'tai rɨ, ti'tui' pʉra rɨ ɨpʉreman nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ esa'to' yai. Serɨ itewan yau esii'ma, tenu ke esii'ma mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨpʉremai'ma tanporon kon wakʉ ton pona.

Paarʉ, Sairas mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Temu'ti pokon winɨpaino, Papa, Ikʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai yau Tesaroni'ka pon kon so'sii enakan: Wakʉ nonkasa' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusewankamai' pʉra e'nɨto' nesii ɨyenakan kon pe.
Tɨwɨ tanporon kon pɨ' ɨsɨ pe pʉra ɨwe'to' nʉsenei. A'ko pe Itepuru man.
Apʉne pʉra serɨ pʉreti ɨku auya'nokon a'tai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ko' yawon ensi auya'nokon a'tai, Itepuru uma'ta'pʉ ekama auya'nokon pe iyesi iyepʉ pʉ'kʉ pona.
Apurɨto' yau iyɨpʉremasa' uya takuru'kenan epi'tɨ mɨrɨ; Itepuru uya rɨ i'mʉ'sa'ka. Imakoitasa' pe iyesi yau, ipɨ' rɨ usentu'man.
Tenki ta uya Papa iyapiyo' pe esii'ma unapurɨpɨtʉnʉ pɨ', utamokori ton uya ikuu'pʉ kasa, wakʉ pe itewan esii'ma ewarupɨ kaisa rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wʉi kaisa rɨ inke rɨ uyenu yau ɨkupʉ uya ɨpʉrema yau.
To' ukɨ'pɨ'nʉnpɨtʉ'pʉ wʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tɨ' amʉ' pɨ', “Ina pona ata'mo'ka', ina onankɨ kʉrɨ rɨ apono' po iyereutasa' na'ne' enu piyapai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ karimeru mʉre uya kota'man nɨto' piyapai!

“Tʉpana ke te'sen, tɨwɨ Ita'kwarʉ uya so'si ton auro'kayai'ne' etai. Kʉrɨ rɨ entakanin nʉ'pʉ repato' uya oton tonan tawon mana tato' kiyari ke mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ aimu'nan tɨ' ke irepato' uya oton, emenna' ese' e'menukasa' ipɨ', tʉron kon ni'tunʉ pen nɨ, eponin nɨken ni'tunʉ.
Mentai tesi kon ke pʉsamoro ti'sa amʉ' uya ɨyennaka kon panton amʉ' tiwano' kon pe rɨ tʉnkoneka'pʉ kon ke. To' kota'mato' ike man moro rɨ pena rɨ to' e'ma tau, to' ma'tanʉ'nin e'nʉnsa' pʉra rɨ iyesi.
Mɨrɨ wenai, Papa uya nin si meruntɨ to' enku'tɨnin nɨ ennoko mɨrɨ tennakanin kon nɨ apurɨnin pe to' e'to' pe.
Iye'menukasa' na'ne' kasa: “Papa ese' e'sapema Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen koro'tau ɨmɨrɨ'nokon uriya',” tawon.

Isanes mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Isanpʉres uya Mosi' ewa'noma'pʉ kasa kuru, mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ pʉsamoro ka'pon amʉ' uya i'nairon ewa'noma—ka'pon amʉ' isenuminkato' ima'tasa' kon, apurɨto' pɨ' e'nɨ koro'tau, eno'masa' kon nɨ.
“Uni'nʉnkanʉ ton pɨrɨ'kanin mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' panamanin urɨ. Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', i'napairon pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ amakooi kon yapai tera'tɨi' e'tɨ'.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', apurɨto' poro Papa uya uyanʉnsa' kon ipokena' pe pɨ', usewankaman nɨto' pʉra iyesi Papa pokon pe e'nɨ pɨ' Sises Kʉrai, uyepuru kon poro,
Ɨuko'manto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ enupan nɨto' auya enkɨ a'ko pe. Ɨnku'pai kuru e'kɨ, apʉne pʉra iku'sa' auya yau, asa'rɨ ɨyepika'tɨ kon, ɨmɨrɨ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kamoro ɨyetanin nan.

Inke rɨ, utɨpɨtʉ'pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ' usenupato' ton iwʉ' kaisa rɨ'ne to' kota'mapɨtʉ pɨ'. Miyarɨ rɨ to' a'kwarʉka pɨ' ɨri pe Papa pɨ' asauro'tɨ' tawon pe e'pɨtʉ'pʉ. Pana' pe usakorooi yau tʉutɨsen pe e'pɨ'tai ɨnno'nan pata ton ya' to' poni'simato' pe uya.
I'naino makoi tʉrawasooi esi tense rɨ: ekuman nɨto', ɨri eseru kupʉ pɨ' e'nɨto', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ unɨkɨrun nɨto',
Mɨrɨ wenai, kʉrɨ ipɨnnin mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kʉrɨ inanʉ'nin esi mɨrɨ ɨ'rɨ pan pe pʉra rɨ, e'tane Papa rɨken ɨ'rɨ rɨ a'tanʉ'nin.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ɨ'rɨ rɨ Iya'kwarʉ uya ɨyemeporʉ'tɨto' kon temeporʉ ke pʉra ɨwesi kon pen nɨ ɨnenpai kuru ɨyenurikʉ kon koro'tau Sises Kʉrai usenpoika.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ main eta'pʉ uya Epʉn winɨpai. Eke tuna ena kasa iseta'pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke pe korʉme e'tʉrʉnpɨtʉ kasa. Main uneta'pʉ useta'pʉ wai turunpanin nan uya tʉwaai kon, a'pu turunpa kasa.

Tanporo kareta amʉ' pu'kena' ton nʉmenuka'pʉ ka'pon amʉ' auro'kanin pe ipɨ' uya serɨ ekamasa': Ɨnʉ' rɨ kʉrɨ Sises apurɨnin pe te'sen uya, tʉmakooi pɨ' usentu'man nɨto' eporo mɨrɨ itese' poro,” ta'pʉ iya.
Kamoro ka'pon amʉ' sa'man annawɨrɨ wakʉ kupʉ pɨ' te'san uya eke pe tʉku'to' kon, tʉnamato' kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eri'nɨto' pen warinpa ena' inke rɨ uko'man nɨto' tʉrʉ iya.

Isaan winɨpaino, 7 kaisaron so'si amʉ' Eisa po te'san enakan. Wakʉ nonkasa' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusewankamai' pʉra e'nɨto' nesii ɨpiyau'nokon, moro te'sen, moro iye'sa' rʉ'pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉuye'ton winɨpaino, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ 7 kaisaron kon iya'kwarʉ amʉ' iyapon rau te'san winɨpaino,
Paarʉ uya to' maimu eikʉ'pʉ, “Isaan uya pa'taisiman nɨto' esi'pʉ mɨrɨ makoi yapai ka'pon amʉ' era'tɨto' pe, to' auro'ka'pʉ iya te'ma'pʉ pe tʉuye'sen Sises tapurɨi' to' e'to' pe,” ta'pʉ iya to' pɨ'.

serɨ kasa si serɨ esi yau, Itepuru uya nin si i'tu ka'pon amʉ' Papa uya tasa' kasa te'san pika'tɨto' tʉuya i'tupɨ'nin esi yau, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ipokena' ton pen a'si iya eseru aimenkato' weyu pʉ'kʉ pona, miyarɨ rɨ to' kota'mai'ma.
E'tane ru'ku, wakʉ kuru pata, Epʉn pon enupɨkɨrɨ to' esi. Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', Papa ɨpiyɨtʉ pen nɨ, to' e'to' itese' pɨ' ta a'tai tʉpɨ', apʉne pʉra to' pata konekasa' tʉuya pɨ'.
Ennakan nɨto' rɨ Papa pʉn nɨ panton pɨ' kesii mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ sepan nɨ panton no'sami'si' rɨ te'sen; e'tane ru'ku, Papa uya tasa' kasa pɨ' ɨsenupa'.
To' utanʉnsa' utɨ'pʉ non emʉ' kaisa rɨ e'sorʉ'mai'ma, mɨrɨpan kon uya Papa munkɨ amʉ' pata'se' oimentɨ'pʉ, eke pata ini'nʉnkanʉ, e'tane apo' u'tɨ'pʉ Epʉn winɨpai, mɨrɨpan uya to' ma'tanʉkʉ'pʉ.
To' apiyo'ma'pʉ iya to' epa'taisimato' pe Sises Kʉrai ese' yau, mɨrɨpan kon uya Pi'ta ekama'po'pʉ tʉpiyau'nokon iko'manto' pe miyarɨ rʉ'kwɨ parɨ.
Pori' pe ɨwesi yau tenku'na' nan anin pe ɨwesi pɨ', ewarupɨ yau te'san weyu pe ɨwesi pɨ',
Serɨ si uyauro'ka'pʉ iya 'nokon itʉto' pe tʉuya—tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto'.

E'tane ipu'ketʉ, Epʉn poi tʉuye'sen esi mɨrɨ wapiya kuru esukenan nɨ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusewankamai' pʉra e'nɨto', tʉusi'nʉnkasen, tʉron kon ennin, main awɨron nɨ, ɨsentu'kena' rɨ, eke rɨ wakʉ ku'nin, te'menkasen pen nɨ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'napairon nɨ.
Ikʉipʉnʉ uya tʉmu i'nʉnka, tanporon nɨ nɨrɨ tʉsa' iya itena'.

Tɨnɨn pɨ' Itepuru esi pen tʉusaurokʉ'pʉ kupʉ pɨ', tʉron kon tɨnɨn pokon to'ka'nʉ'ai'ne' kasa. Ɨpɨ'nokon iseta'ka pen, ɨnʉ' yan nɨ uma'ta i'se pʉra iyesi, e'tane tanporon kon uyepʉ makoi apai tera'tɨi' rɨken.
Tanporo warawo' amʉ' esi i'se e'ai' urɨ kasa. E'tane kaisa rɨ'ne Papa uya uyemeporʉ kon ke repapɨ' nɨsa', tʉron nɨ esi se esa' pe, tʉron nɨ mɨ esa' pe.
Usi'nʉnkan eseru awɨrɨ e'tɨ', Iya'kwarʉ uya ɨyemeporʉ'tɨ kon i'se esii'ma, pu'kena' pe ɨwe'to' kon emeporʉ kuru.
Apʉne pʉra Papa, “Tɨwɨ a'kwa ne'wei'tɨi ewarupɨ apai,” tawon nʉ'pʉ uya tʉweyu e'wei'tɨto' pe iku'sa' uyewan kon yau uwei'tɨnin kon pe eke pe Papa ku'to' i'tunin pe e'nɨto' kon pe Kʉrai emʉ' yau.
Mɨrɨ koro'tau, A'poros, Esuwerʉ pe te'sen, Arisantiriya pon uyee'pʉ E'pe'sas pona. Wakʉ pe kuru tʉusauro'sen ye', iye'menukasa' itekare i'tunin pe iyesi'pʉ.
Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ, Sises ekota'ma'pʉ e'ne' pe eke kuru pata mʉra'taai pʉroroi entau, wakʉ pe tʉmunkɨ amʉ' ekonekato' pe tʉmʉnʉ winɨ.
Serɨ ton pɨ' si enupan auya mɨrɨ. Tanporon ɨmeruntɨrʉ ke ɨnenupanʉ ton ipori'ma' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' esereme'kɨ. Ɨnʉ' rɨ tenu yau pʉra ɨku'nin.
Se kasa Papa uya tʉusi'nʉnkato' enpoika'pʉ mɨrɨ u'koro'tau'nokon: Tikin nan kuru rɨ Tʉmu ennoko'pʉ iya serɨ non pona, iporo uko'man nɨto' kon pe.
“Papai, urepasa' auya ike na'ne' nan i'se esi upiyau e'ai'ne' yau, uyapurɨpɨ'to' ento' pe to' uya, urepa'pʉ auya na'ne' ike, apʉne pʉra ui'nʉnka auya pɨ', orʉ ekoneka rawɨrɨ rɨ.
to' utɨ'pʉ e'ma'pʉ tau uma'tan nɨsa' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ usewankaman nɨto' e'nɨmɨ,
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', eke kuru si use'man nɨto' tʉrawasomanin epuru esa' pe e'nɨ pɨ', itɨsa' na'ne' Epʉn pona, Sises, Papa Mumu, uta'sinpai'nokon meruntɨ pe ekama na'ne' apurɨto' pɨ'.
Apʉne pʉra inamato' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke pe iku'to' eporo'pʉ iya Papa, Ikʉipʉnʉ winɨ, main uyee'pʉ a'tai itena' Eke A'kwa winɨpai, “Pʉse rɨ pʉse rɨ Umu, Uni'nʉnkanʉ; ipɨ' kuru epori'mayai'!” tawon.
Tanporo serɨ ton na'ne' esi tikin nan nɨ, mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ Iya'kwarʉ tʉrawasooi pe, itʉsa' iya ka'pon kaisa rɨ iye'kupʉ i'se te'to' awɨrɨ.

Mɨrɨ tʉpo to' asakɨrɨ'pano uya tʉwaai turunpa'pʉ. Mɨrɨ a'tai, 1/3 e'to' airɨ wʉi enu pʉ'kʉ, 1/3 e'to' airɨ kapʉi pʉ'kʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ 1/3 e'to' airɨ sirikɨ amʉ' tonpa ton e'wɨnɨ'pʉ, 1/3 e'to' airɨ rɨ a'kwa pe iye'to' pʉra to' esi'pʉ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ 1/3 e'to' airɨ wʉi naino pʉ'kʉ esi'pʉ iweyu pʉra, 1/3 e'to' airɨ kanan ewarupɨ pʉ'kʉ.

Mɨrɨpan kon era'tɨ'pʉ, Esuwerʉ amʉ' usenupato' iwʉ' epuru a'sise'na, Sostenes itese', mɨrɨpan arɨ'pʉ to' uya ko'tʉ pɨ' e'nɨto' iwʉ' tapai, mɨrɨpan ari'po'pɨtʉ'pʉ to' uya ko'tʉ pɨ' e'nɨto' iwʉ' pʉrorooi po. Mɨrɨ pɨ' Kariyo usewankama'pʉ pen nɨ.
Mɨrɨ wenai kanan a'si i'se to' esi'pʉ, e'tane to' enapai iyemo'ka'pʉ.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ina uya inonka pen. Kɨpo'po ina a'mota tane, e'tane ti'nau'nokon ina ena emenna' pe wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, Meri uya ten yau rɨ esukenan natʉ, epe'kena' po'piyun nee'pʉ, mɨrɨpan ma'pʉ iya Sises pʉta pona, ikuka'pʉ iya tʉnse' ke, mɨrɨpan po'piyun kɨtun uya a'po'ne ɨutɨ kɨ'nʉnpasa' esi'pʉ.

Apurɨto' winɨ tʉpata oton koneka'pʉ iya usauro'nɨsa' rʉ'pʉ ipɨ' nono yau, ka'kʉran pe rɨ ɨnnon nɨ pata yau; ta'porin tau iko'manpɨtʉ'pʉ, Aisi' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Seko' pokon nɨ nɨrɨ uko'mamʉ'pʉ mɨrɨ kasa, mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ usauro'nɨsa' rʉ'pʉ ipɨ' eponin nan ipokon pe,
Tʉron kon a'kɨrɨ e'sara'tɨtɨ' unkupʉ'pʉ kupʉ pɨ' utonpa ton, kamo ina nʉkupʉ'pʉ kasa tʉuko'mansan entɨ'.
Ɨtonpa kon wari'sarʉ atɨ'; mɨrɨ a'tai, Kʉrai maimu a'ku'tɨ auya'nokon mɨrɨ.
Ene auya'nokon ka'pon koneka Papa uya wakʉ pe inkupʉnʉ winɨ, inapurɨnʉ winɨ rɨken pen.
Ɨ'rɨ ken si ta mɨrɨ a'tai? Ɨri pe pe' Papa esi ta? Pen kuru rɨ!
Ɨ'sɨ'mʉra na'ne' apurɨto' iya yau, anʉntɨ', iteseru taimenkai' pʉra tʉron nɨ pe iteseru esi pɨ' ipokon pe te'sei'pɨ'se pʉra.
Usewa'noman esi'pʉ Epʉn po. Maikarʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itinserʉʉi amʉ' uya urupere ewa'noma'pʉ, mɨrɨpan kon ewa'noma'pʉ urupere mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itinserʉʉi ton uya.
“Asakorooi kon yau kamakoitatʉu.” Wʉi enu u'tɨ tane ke'tʉu ausakorotasa' kon nɨ marɨ e'tane,
Ɨri te'mai' pʉra ɨri ke e'tɨ', mɨrɨ pe pʉra e'sapeman, e'sapeman ke, e'tane ɨpʉreman ke, apʉne pʉra serɨ pona ɨkɨ'masa' kon mɨrɨ, Papa uya ɨpʉremato' kon pe.
Uyenno'nin nʉ'pʉ rɨ pokon pe esi; tikin sarɨ unonkasa' iya pen, apʉne pʉra ipori'manin ku'nin pe esi ke,” ta'pʉ iya.
Pana' pe e'soto'katɨ' i'nairon ɨpokʉrʉʉi kon pe ɨworo'pai kon oi, ipoken e'nɨto' ɨpɨtɨ kon wapu pe,

Serɨ si ama'aino ekamanin, 7 kaisaron kon sirikɨ amʉ' uyemiyatʉ enwo'netʉ yau na'ne' nan mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ 7 kaisaron korʉ pun konekasa' raan'pu apon ton: Kamoro 7 kaisaron kon sirikɨ amʉ' esi 7 kaisaron so'si inserʉʉi amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ 7 kaisaron raan'pu apon ton esi 7 kaisaron so'si amʉ' ekamanin pe.

E'tane Sises ene'nokon, mara rʉ'kwɨ aiko pe inserʉ amʉ' o'no ikonekasa' rʉ'pʉ, itarʉko'tɨsa' si a'kwa ke mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ inamato' ke, apʉne pʉra uma'tan nɨto' yau iyekota'masa' pɨ', Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa' winɨ tanporon kon iwano' pe uma'tan nɨto' i'tuto' pe iya.
apʉne pʉra Papa e'tʉrawasoma ayau'nokon iku'nin pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨnku'pai ɨwesi kon pa ipori'manin pe te'sen.
Serɨ ke apana'tɨsa' uya 'nokon mɨrɨ pori' pe e'to' pe ɨpɨ'nokon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ pori' pe ɨwe'to' kon e'to' pe mararon pe pʉra.
Paarʉ, Kʉrai Sises nennoko'pʉ tekareei ekamai' Papa uya tapiyo'mai' urɨ'nokon pika'tɨnin mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Kʉrai Sises, urɨ'nokon e'ku'to' ipɨ' winɨpaino,

Uri'sami'si amʉ' nɨrɨ epontɨ i'se esi itenu entai pʉra, tapurɨsen ye' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wakʉ iteseru ye' pe, ika'pɨ'sa' ipʉrʉ'tɨsa' i'pai pe pʉra mɨrɨ pe pʉra korʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra mokon mɨrɨ pe pʉra epe'kena' ipon pe pʉra,
Si'na' amʉ' tʉkonekai' to' ari'po'pɨ'to' tʉuya ike pe, paka amʉ', karimeru amʉ' enpa'kanʉkʉ'pʉ iya; pʉrata ensimanin nan tepʉrʉʉi rawoipɨtʉ'pʉ iya, to' pʉrataai tʉrʉ'pɨtʉ'pʉ iya.
Apʉne pʉra Papa tʉrawasooi rʉ'san urɨ'nokon, ika'sa' kon Kʉrai Sises yau wakʉ tʉrawaso ku'nin nan pe, Papa nʉkoneka'pʉ uye'mata'nokon iku'to' pe.
Utonpa ton nʉ'kwɨ, kɨsewansiukatʉu, ɨsɨ rɨ ɨi'tuto' kon yau ɨyekota'ma kon pɨ', ti'tupɨ'sen pen nɨ e'kupʉ kasa rɨ ɨpɨ'nokon.
Epori'manpai'nokon, pori' pe e'nɨpai'nokon, eke pe iye'to' apurɨpɨ'pai'nokon! Karimeru mʉre emari'ma weyu e'seposa' man, ino'pʉ pe te'ton ekonekasa' man ite'ma ta'.
Epika'tɨn nɨto' anʉntɨ' ayarʉkooi kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨsuparaai kon pe Iya'kwarʉ, Papa Maimu pe te'sen.
To' tonpa Esuwerʉ pon wɨpɨtʉ Isi' ko' uya ene'pʉ iya, mɨrɨpan utɨ'pʉ Esuwerʉ pon pika'tɨse'na. Mɨrɨpan e'ma'pʉ Mosi' uya, Isi' ko' tʉwɨse.
E'tane nin si, ina tonpa ton, kemiya'nʉntʉu wakʉ eseru kupʉ pɨ'.
Ɨiwano' kon pe rɨ ɨserasu kon pe e'tɨ'; sa'man pe e'tɨ' anapurɨnʉ kon yau; enari'ke' pe pʉra, pana' pe e'tɨ'.

Papa tato' pe ipɨ' ika'sa' More' iwʉ' apɨtʉ'pʉ auya'nokon, sirikɨ pe ika'sa' ka'pon amʉ' nesakʉnʉ Re'pan tukai'. Ika'sa' ɨwɨpʉremato' kon ipɨ'. Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ɨyenno'to' uya 'nokon oton ɨnnɨ Paperan enta'.
Mɨrɨ wenai, ina tonpa ton, pana' pe e'mʉ'sa'katɨ', ina uya ɨyenupa'pʉ kon nʉ'pʉ tʉmaimu kon winɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉkaretaai kon yau rɨ pɨ'.
Papa si kʉrɨ rɨ uka'nin nʉ'pʉ kon serɨto' pe, mɨrɨpan uya urepasa' kon Ita'kwarʉ ke emaikasa' pe, tʉuye'ton e'ma takan pe.
Uri'sami'si amʉ' usenupato' pe iyesi e'pana esii'ma mɨrɨpan kon e'to' pe iyesi main awɨron kon pe.
So'si epuru pɨ' usauro'nɨto' kʉsetai, asa'ron kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra osorʉwawon kon ennin nʉ'san esi a'tai rɨken metai'.
Miyarɨ ka'tɨ' ɨsipokon pe wakʉ eseru yau auta'su'ka kon pe. Tanporon Kʉrai so'sii ton miyarɨ nɨkayan.

Amuru tʉrʉ'pɨ'to' oton to' uya ti'pai kon pona, tʉuta'kwarʉkai' akaramʉi'ma to' ukɨ'pɨ'nʉnpɨ'to' oton: “‘Ɨsɨ kusa! Ɨsɨ kusa mɨrɨ eke pata! Mɨrɨ pata winɨ kamoro parau kau kanau esanon ena'pʉ imaminkena' pe, itimamin winɨ rɨ. Tikin ite'kwa kʉra' emiya era'tɨto' airɨ ima'tasa'!

Eke pe kuru rɨ tʉusi'nʉnkato' nonkasa' Ikʉipʉnʉ uya upona'nokon, mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ' Papa munkɨ pe rɨ e'sesa'nɨto' kon pe iyesi! Kamoro pe rɨ si e'nɨ! Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', orʉ uya i'tun pʉra rɨ iyesi, apʉne pʉra Papa i'tu iya pʉra rɨ iyesi ke.

Moine ton, mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ e'tʉtɨ' kɨɨyi' amʉ' ena'. Epontɨtɨ' mɨ pe te'ku'se pʉra e'nɨto' ke ɨtonpa kon amʉ' winɨkʉi', apʉne pʉra, “Papa uya mɨ pe te'ku'san ewaruma'tɨ, e'tane mɨ pe te'ku'san pen pona wakʉ nonkasa' tʉrʉ iya.” tasa'.
Pen kuru rɨ! Tɨwɨ Papa nesii i'nai rɨ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tanporon kon e'tane kasi ye' pe. Iye'menukasa' na'ne': “Ipokena' pe ɨusi'tu pa amaimu yau ɨyeseru aimenkato' yau itentai ɨyena pa,” tawon.
Papa ena' use'man nɨto' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton uya auro'ka'pʉ iye'to' pe Tamaskas pona ɨyese' pɨ' te'san a'sipɨ'se'na, to' ase'na Surusiran pona,” ta'pʉ Ananayas uya.

E'tane ka'pon amʉ' koro'tau rɨ nɨrɨ ennakanin nan pu'kena' amʉ' esi'pʉ, ennakanin nan ti'sa amʉ' e'to' oton ɨ'koro'tau'nokon mɨrɨ kasa rɨ. Ama'ai to' uya ma'tanʉ'nin nɨ enupan nɨto' ewonnʉ'to' oton, eke Itepuru rɨ nonka to' uya tennanin kon nʉ'pʉ—tiwano' kon pe rɨ inke pʉra tʉuma'tato' kon nepʉ to' uya.

Serɨ tawon uya rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' epuru ton kupʉ'pʉ miyarɨ rɨ ɨnwɨpai; Main nɨken Sapa' pɨ' enupanin i'kwɨ'sa' iya pen, e'tane Papa esi tʉkʉipʉnʉ pe kuru tasa' iya pɨ', serɨ winɨ si Papa kaisarɨ rɨ iye'ku'sa' pɨ'.
Kanyapurɨpɨ'atʉi' tanporon yau rɨ ɨyenu kon yau ukupʉ auya'nokon pɨ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ auta'sisa' kon pɨ' rɨ enupan nɨto' pɨ', ɨyena'nokon inɨ'kwɨrɨ'nʉkʉ uya kaisa rɨ.
Pena Tepi' uya Itepuru maimu ekama'pʉ, “‘Papa, Itepuru ene uya inke rɨ upiyau. Mɨrɨ uriya', usi'nʉkʉ pen.
Apʉne pʉra ɨyentuka'sa' kon kanan, tʉuma'tasen itena'pɨ apai pen e'tane tʉuma'tasen pen apai, tɨwɨro' rɨ tʉuko'mansen Papa Maimu poro.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ɨtonpa kon pɨ' rɨ amakooi kon ekamatɨ', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨtonpa kon pona rɨ ɨpʉrematɨ', ɨusepi'tɨ kon pa. Ipokena' e' pe te'sen ka'pon ɨpʉrema esi mɨrɨ ipan pe meruntɨ pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉwotori'pɨ ke.
I'napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ'nokon; kʉrɨ apurɨpɨ' na'ne' uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto' eposa'.
Piyapaino pe ɨnɨmɨ uya 'nokon pen; ɨpiya'nokon uyepʉ rɨ.
Eke pe rɨ tanporon yau rɨ! Tanporon wapiya, Papa maimu kuru rɨ e'nonka'pʉ mɨrɨ to' ena'.
Apiyo' ton, non pon kon ɨyepuru kon maimu awɨrɨ e'tɨ', to' nama pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tenari'nʉnse to' pɨ', wakʉ pe itewan, Kʉrai maimu awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pe rɨ.

Mɨrɨ pe pʉra katɨ, eke pe rɨ ɨsi'nʉnke' pe iye'to' iku'tane auya, ɨyenpɨ'to' iya, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉuseta'kai' pʉra iye'to' nurunpa auya, i'tui'ma pʉra Papa e'to' ɨsi'nʉnke' pe uya ayato' esi ɨyera'tɨto' ya'?
Iye'kupʉ tato' kuru rɨ esi upiyau'nokon Papa epoto' iyau: ɨ'rɨ rɨ ekama'po pe iyesi yau, iteseru yau, uyeta iya 'nokon.
Tɨwɨ Papa e'ku'nɨto' ipɨ' ɨkupʉi'nokon eke pe kuru pori' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusewankamasen pe pʉra tapurɨ auya'nokon koro'tau, ayanʉkʉ kon pa ɨye'ku'to' kon ike ke Wakʉ A'kwarʉ meruntɨrʉ winɨ.
Pata, Sises pokapɨtʉ'pʉ to' uya kurusu' pona na'ne' airɨ iyesi'pʉ umɨ, mɨrɨ umɨ yau emenna' pe tɨ' akasa' uruwai' pe esi'pʉ ɨnʉ' rɨ emaikasa' rʉ'pʉ pen nɨ ya'.

E'tane ene a'si'pʉ to' uya pariki'si ta', ennakanin pu'kena' pokon pe, eke itʉrawasooi ton, i'tuto' ipɨ' ku'nin nʉ'pʉ ipiyau. Serɨ i'tuto' ipɨ' ton ke kamoro ene ma'kʉʉi ke iye'menukasa' kon, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ipe ika'sa' apurɨpɨ'nin nʉ'san enku'tɨ'pʉ iya mɨrɨ. Ene mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ennakanin pu'kena' eno'ma'pʉ to' uya nurɨne apo' ku'pɨri ka' sorʉ'pa ke tepo'tɨsen.
Mɨrɨ pe pʉra: “Iwan pe ɨyeyaton esi yau, a're'tɨkɨ; tuna'kiri' ke iyesi yau, iwo'pakɨ. Serɨ kupʉ auya uya enkena' kamarʉka' amʉranʉkʉ mɨrɨ i'pai pona,” tasa' iya.

Tɨwɨ Kʉrai Maimu nʉko'mamʉi ayau'nokon eke pe kuru, tʉron kon enupa mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ panama auya'nokon koro'tau tanporo tʉpu'ketʉ ke, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eren ton pɨ' ɨserenkai'ma, ɨpʉreman eremu mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ a'kwarʉ eremu ton tenki tai'ma ɨyewan kon yau Papa pɨ'.
Taan'pʉ ton, ɨno'pʉ kon amʉ' i'nʉnkatɨ', ɨsɨ pe to' pɨ' ke'tʉu.

Ɨnʉ' rɨ uri'san Sises apurɨnin pe te'sen tonpa ton pe, itaan'pʉ ima'tasa' rʉ'san esi yau, tɨwɨ to' pika'tɨi so'si pona e'tape'ne' e'nonka namai', so'si uya kamo itaan'pʉ ima'tasa' kon ipan pe kuru nekota'mayai'ne' nan pika'tɨto' pe.
Serɨ si inekamanʉ: Papa uya tɨwɨrɨ uko'man nɨto' ke repan nɨsa', serɨ si uko'man nɨto' esi imu yau.
Kʉrɨ imu esa' pe na'ne' esi uko'man nɨto' esa' pe; kʉrɨ imu esa' pe pʉra na'ne' esi uko'man nɨto' esa' pe pʉra.
Imu uya ɨmo'kasa' kon pe iyesi yau, imo'kasa' pe kuru rɨ ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ɨyekama'po uya 'nokon, temiya'nʉnse pʉra ɨwesi kon pa, ɨwenai'nokon ekota'ma pɨ', eke pe ɨku'to' kon ipɨ' pɨ' rɨ.

Apʉne pʉra pʉsamoro rupɨ esi uyepuru kon Kʉrai apiyo' pe pʉra, e'tane tiwano' kon nɨ. Wakʉ pe kuru rɨ tʉusaurokʉ kon ke, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ennakan nɨto' ike ke entu'ma' rɨ te'san ka'pon amʉ' enku'tɨ to' uya.

To' rɨ si epe'tɨsa' tanporon nɨ ɨri eseru ke, ɨri ke, mentai e'nɨto' ke mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iteseru pe te'sen awɨrɨ pʉra e'nɨto' ike ke. Ɨri pe tʉron kon pɨ' te'ku'san pe to' esi, te'wɨsan pe, ɨsipɨ' te'san pe, enku'tɨnin nan pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri ɨnku'pai te'san pe. Ka'pon eseru pɨ' tʉusauro'san pe,
Ɨyena' inonkasa' na'ne' wakʉ itʉsa' erasu pe e'kɨ—iterasu pe e'kɨ Wakʉ A'kwarʉ uya tʉpika'tɨi' uyau'nokon nʉko'manyai'ne'.
Kʉrɨ rɨ ti'naino ku'nin tʉpori'manin pe esi a'tai, mɨrɨ i'naino uya ima'tanʉkʉ; kʉrɨ rɨ wakʉ Iya'kwarʉ pori'manin pe ipɨnnin esi a'tai, Iya'kwarʉ winɨpai inkero' uko'man nɨto' eporo iya.
Itepuru ti'tupɨ'se e'nɨpai'nokon pʉra, to' tonpa ton esi'pʉ kasa, mɨrɨpan kon na'ne' e'tʉ'ka'pʉ ɨkʉi amʉ' pɨ'.
Ɨri pen nɨ, tʉpɨ' rɨken tʉusenuminkasen pen, se pe rɨ tʉusakorotasen pen, ɨri rʉ'pʉ rɨ ko'manʉ'nin pen.
To' pʉropo nɨpon usene'pʉ wa'ka pun kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' apiri useta'pʉ kaware amʉ' uya tararan pi'sikʉ a'merumʉ ɨsewa'nomase'na to' utɨ a'taino kasa.
Uye'sa' pʉra iyesi yau to' auro'kase'na, tʉmakooi ke to' esi pɨ' ɨri pe to' nesii'no pen nɨ. E'tane nin si, mɨrɨ pɨ', tʉmakooi kon wapu'tɨ to' uya poken pʉra iyesi.
Ti'tui' kuru e'tɨ' ɨ'rɨ rɨ kupʉ auya'nokon a'tai so'si tawon kon pen pɨ'; wakʉ pe ɨweyu kon tapurɨi' e'tɨ'.
Apʉne pʉra i'tu'nokon pena e'nɨto' eseru pokapɨtʉ'pʉ kurusu' pona ipokon pe makoi pun enato' pe ɨ'sɨ'mʉra, makoi poitorʉ ton pe pʉra e'nɨto' kon pe—

Serɨ kasa si i'tu mɨrɨ ɨnʉ' yan esi Papa munkɨ amʉ' pe tukai', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨnʉ' yan esi Makoi munkɨ amʉ' pe tukai': Ɨnʉ' rɨ ipoken te'sen kupʉ iya pʉra rɨ na'ne' esi mɨrɨ Papa mʉre pe pʉra rɨ; ɨnʉ' rɨ nɨrɨ tʉtonpa i'nʉnka iya pʉra na'ne' esi imʉre pe pʉra.
apʉne pʉra tʉmakooikenan usenuminkan nɨto' esi ɨsɨ pe Papa pɨ'. Papa iwano' main ya' iye'tʉrʉ pʉra iyesi, mɨrɨ kupʉ iya poken pʉra rɨ nɨrɨ iyesi.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', pori' pe uyewan yau esii'ma, uyesen uya epori'mato' enpoika. Ayapurɨ uya, Papa, eri'sa' rɨ e'tane, upun uko'mamʉ te'ku'to' yau,
Kane, e'tane Papa i'tunin nan pen use'masa' na'ne' ike esi ɨri ton ena', Papa ena' pen, mɨrɨ pɨ' ɨri ton tonpa pe ɨwesi kon i'se pʉra esi.

Antiyo' po so'si tau te'san koro'tau, pu'kena' ton mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ enupanin nan esi'pʉ. Kamoro si esi'pʉ Panapas; Simiyan, Mekoro tukai' to' nesakʉnʉ; Rusiyas, Sairini itese' pata winon; Manayen, kopʉna Era' isakon pe isemo'kasa' rʉ'pʉ; mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Saarʉ.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ ɨyenku'tɨtɨ'nin itenpʉ'pʉ rɨ main ke, apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ warai'nan pona Papa uya kota'man nɨto' uyepʉ main awɨron kon pen pona.
To' ne'pakapʉi, apʉne pʉra tanporo ɨutɨ ton tawon kon ma'tanʉkʉ pɨ' to' man to' enupato' ike pen nɨ ke to' tenupai'—mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ pʉrata epoto' pe tʉuya'nokon nɨ nin ipoken pʉra rɨ.
I'tu tʉuya wenai teparanka ton; mɨrɨ pɨ' nin si, tanporo wakʉ pe ɨwesi kon pen, ta'pʉ iya na'ne'.
“I'napai rɨ ta uya ɨpɨ'nokon; kʉrɨ rɨ mʉra'ta awɨrɨ pʉra tewonsen karimeru amʉ' iwʉ' ta' e'tane tʉron nɨ winɨ tewonsen esi mɨrɨ ama' e', rapumanin nɨ.
To' uya to'saron asanta nɨnsa' to' utɨsa' Peran, Peyorʉ mu e'ma tawɨrɨ tʉutɨto' kon pe ɨri epe'pʉ i'nʉnkanin.
Mɨrɨ yau, Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' usaurokʉ'pʉ Paarʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Panapas kota'mato' pɨ', tepuru kon pokon pe to' e'kama'pʉ, tɨ' ke to' wɨto' pe tʉuya'nokon.

Itosorʉwano ite'kwa pe Sises uya ta'pʉ ipɨ', “Saiman, Isaan mumu, ui'nʉnkayan pe'?” ta'pʉ iya. Pi'ta ena'pʉ pokoi pe, apʉne pʉra Sises uya tekama'posa' pɨ' osorʉwau ite'kwa, “Ui'nʉnkayan pe'?” tukai', mɨrɨpan uya, “Uyepuru, tanporon nɨ i'tu auya; ɨi'nʉnka uya rɨ i'tu auya,” ta'pʉ. Sises uya, “Uikʉn non ken si karimeru amʉ' ewe'kɨ.

Ɨri pe na'ne' ewonto' oton pen nɨ mɨrɨ pata ya', mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨnʉ' rɨ Papa ewaruma ku'nin, mɨrɨ pe pʉra kasi pe te'sen, e'tane kamo rɨken karimeru mʉre uko'man nɨto' karetaai pɨ' rɨken itese' e'menukasa' kon ewonto' oton iya'.

Uri'san epontɨsa' esi'pʉ tʉtariren pon ya', isuweyu ya', mɨrɨpan uta'kʉ'tɨsa' esi'pʉ korʉ ke, epe'kena' ton tɨ' ke mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wakʉ ton mokon ke. Tenau ko' korʉ pun konekasa' a'sisa' iya esi'pʉ, ɨri ton kuru nuirapanin nan ke iyepe'tɨsa' esi'pʉ, tekumai' ɨri ton ku'sa' iya moron nʉ'pʉ.
Tanporo serɨ ton pʉro'pona, usi'nʉnkan nɨto' ipata'tɨtɨ', tanporo serɨ ton amʉranʉ'nin wakʉ pe ɨsipona.
Sises uya to' eikʉ'pʉ, “Iweyu si e'seposa' man Ka'pon, Papa winon apurɨpɨ'to' weyu.
Ɨmɨrɨ iyemari'masa' kon ka'pon amʉ' kʉsekumanin tawon, tekumasen pe' ɨmɨrɨ? Ɨmɨrɨ papa tato' ipɨ' pe ika'sa' itewaruma, ɨpʉreman nɨto', use'man nɨto' iwʉ' ton pe' rapumanin ɨmɨrɨ?
E'tane makoi, iku'to' uya iwinɨ ta'sii' apiyontɨn nɨto' winɨ, uya uyau tanporon nɨ i'se ipan pe esi ku'sa'. Apʉne pʉra main pʉra iyesi a'tai, makoi esi iyeri'sa' pe.
Ɨpika'tɨ uya mɨrɨ ɨtonpa ton Esuwerʉ amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen namai'. Ɨyennoko uya to' piya'

Pena urɨ'nokon nɨ nɨrɨ esi'pʉ iya'kwarʉ pʉra, Papa maimu awɨrɨ pʉra, enku'tɨsa' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tanporon nɨ ɨri ton ɨnku'pai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tanporon nɨ kupʉ uya pori' pe ukupʉ tawon uya ta'sii'. Uko'man nɨ'pʉ'nokon ɨri ɨnku'pai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ukinitan pɨ', ewaruma'tɨsa' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tonpa ewaruma'tɨ pɨ'.

Ayapiyontɨ uya serɨ, Papa uya mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Kʉrai Sises uya mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ anʉnsa' kon inserʉ amʉ' uya entane, serɨ ton iku'kɨ, ukayai'ne' ton kupʉ auya i'se esi te'menkai' pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tenu yawon ke ɨwesi pɨ' kʉ'kupʉi.
Mɨrɨ pɨ' ɨyenu kon yau ɨwe'to' kon kʉseno'matʉu; eke pe ɨyepe'pʉ kon eporo auya'nokon mɨrɨ.
Esa'sa' pe iyesi kamoro itena' inonkasa' pe na'ne' nan e'to' pe iyesi tʉusaurokʉ'pʉ kon iyawɨron kon pe.
Pi'ta uko'mamʉ'pʉ Isa'pa po ka'pon, Saiman itese', o' pi'pɨ konepɨ'nin piyau.
I'tu auya'nokon pʉra pe' nai, ɨmɨrɨ'nokon nɨ esi Papa iwʉ' pe, mɨrɨpan Papa A'kwarʉ uko'mamʉ ayau'nokon?
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', utonpa ton, ewon nɨ'nokon Ipan Wakʉ Kuru Pata ya' tukai' uyenu kon yau e'nɨ'nokon pɨ' Sises mʉnʉ winɨ,
Sises uya kanan takaa'pʉ to' pɨ', “Utɨto' oton mɨrɨ. Uwarinpato' auya'nokon oton, e'tane amakooi kon yau rɨ auma'tato' oton kon. Ɨutɨ kon pʉra iyesi utɨyai'ne' ya',” ta'pʉ iya.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', Papa munkɨ inanʉmʉ'san pe ɨwesi kon koro'tau, wakʉ pe, ti'nʉnkasan pe, epontɨtɨ' ɨsentu'kena' ke, ɨsi'nʉnkena' ke, mɨ pe te'ku'sen pen ke, ɨ'sɨ'mʉn yaino ke mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉuseta'kasen pen ke.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ uyapiyo' pe na'ne' uya uye'ma'pʉkato' pe iyesi; e'ai'ne' yau rɨ upoitorʉ rɨ kanan e'to' pe iyesi. Ukʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ uyapiyo' pe na'ne' nama mɨrɨ.
Wakʉ pe tamʉtʉ ton esa' e' pe iye'to' pe iyesi mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉmunkɨ amʉ' esi tʉmaimu awɨrɨ ennin pe tʉnamai'ma wakʉ pe.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ɨtonpa kon amʉ' tʉpori'mapɨ'se, tʉpika'tɨpɨ'se e'tɨ', mʉku'atʉi'ne' kasa rɨ.
Main, iyepiya'tɨ si'kɨrɨ ɨneta'pʉ kon esi se kasa: Utonpa kon amʉ' ti'nʉnkai' e'nɨto' kon pe.
Serɨ pe rɨ nin sa'man yau rɨ e'nɨ pɨ', me'atʉi'ne' kasa rɨ nin ɨwesi kon i'se esi tukai' rɨ nin usenuminka.
Moro ka'pon esi'pʉ Nekutimas itese', Esuwerʉ amʉ' epuru, Pari'si amʉ' tonpa pe te'sen.
Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ, Reyapu, ekumanpɨ' te'sen pɨ' ipokena' e' ta'pʉ inkupʉ'pʉ wenai, ama'ai non ense'na itɨsa' kon apontɨsa' iya a'tai, mɨrɨpan kon ennoko'pʉ iya tʉron nɨ awɨrɨ pɨ' pen pe'?
E'tane uri'sami'si amʉ' epika'tɨto' oton to' umu'ta winɨ—apurɨto' yau to' esi yau, usi'nʉnkan nɨto' yau, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wakʉ pe tiwano' kon pe, tʉuse'se'tɨto' kon ke.

Papa, urɨ'nokon Esuwerʉ amʉ' napurɨnʉ iya utamokori kon anʉmʉ'pʉ, mɨrɨpan kon epankasa' tʉuya, ka'kʉran pe to' esi koro'tau Isi' po. Inke rɨ tʉuko'mamʉ tʉpo, Papa iya tʉmeruntɨrʉ ke to' enpa'ka'pʉ mɨrɨ pata apai.
Papa, tanporon usenuminkato' i'tunin uya enpoika'pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen anʉmʉ tʉuya Wakʉ A'kwarʉ tʉrʉ tʉuya winɨ to' pona, urɨ'nokon pɨ' ikupʉ'pʉ tʉuya kasa.

Apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ, “Iyemari'masa' kʉsekumankai,” tawon uya rɨ marɨ, “Ɨnʉ' rɨ kʉ'wɨnɨi,” tasa' esi. Iyemari'masa' ekumankanin pe pʉra rɨ ɨwesi yau, e'tane iwɨsa' auya yau, main i'kwɨ'nin pe rɨ ɨyenasa' mɨrɨ.
Tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto' ike ke to' repa uya, to' uma'tato' oton pen nɨ; ɨnʉ' uya to' mo'kato' oton pen uyemiyatʉ apai.
Papa usewankaman nɨto' pʉn nɨ uya Se'tan amo'korokʉ mɨrɨ a'ta kon o'no. Uyepuru kon Sises uya wakʉ nonkasa' nesii ɨpiyau'nokon.
Papa uya tasa' pɨ' tesi kon tukai' to' e'kupʉ e'tane imeruntɨrʉ nurunpa to' uya. To' kʉsa'pɨ'pɨtʉi.
mɨrɨ kasa Kʉrai yau urɨ'nokon, tu'kan kon nɨ ena tikin nɨ ipun pe, mɨrɨpan esi ɨsipʉ'kʉ pe'ne.

Serɨ serɨ tapurɨsen kuru main. Serɨ ton pɨ' kuru ausaurokʉ i'se e'ai' kamoro Papa apurɨsa' iya na'ne' nan e'to' pe ti'tui' kuru te'tʉsan pe wakʉ pe te'sen ku'nin pe. Serɨ ton amʉ' esi mɨrɨ wakʉ ton pe kuru tanporon kon ku'nin pe wakʉ pe.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itekare iye'menukasa' nin si uta'ku'tɨsa', “Epʉra'an uya Papa apurɨ'pʉ, mɨrɨ pɨ' nin si ipokena' pe te'sen ta,” mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa tonpa tukai' esa'sa' na'ne'.
Utonpa ton, a'kwa yawon Uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai apurɨnin pe ɨwesi kon koro'tau, tenu yawon ke ke'tʉu.
“To' esen ton esi emenna' ton akasa' uruwai' ton pe; to' ani ton esi enku'tɨn nɨto' ku'nin pe.” “Ɨkʉi urarii rɨ esi to' e'pi pɨ'.”
Mɨrɨ na'ne' kasa, taan'pʉ ton uya tʉno'pʉ kon i'nʉnkato' pe iyesi tʉpun kon i'nʉnka tʉuya'nokon pe rɨ. Kʉrɨ tʉno'pʉ i'nʉnkanin usi'nʉnka rɨ mɨrɨ.
Ɨ'rɨ ken si ta mɨrɨ a'tai? Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen, ipoken e'nɨto' ku'nin nʉ'san pen, uya si eposa', tanʉnto' kon ipokena' pe apurɨto' winɨ teposen;
To' uta'sito' pe ipan nɨ i'nairon ton apurɨto' pɨ' wakʉ pe itewan.

Kamo apurɨnin nan pe na'ne' itesanon uya mara to' namato' pe pʉra iyesi, apʉne pʉra ɨsitonpa pe tesi kon pɨ'. E'tane ru'ku, wakʉ pe parɨ to' apiyo' pe to' e'to' pe iyesi, apʉne pʉra to' tʉrawasooi rʉ'pʉ winɨ tepika'tɨsan pe apurɨnin nan esi pɨ', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' esanon esi to' poitorʉ ton ni'nʉnkanʉ ton pe. Serɨ ton ke to' enupa' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' uya iku'to' pe iku'kɨ.
Ɨ'rɨ pe ken iyesi to' tonpa ton uya apurɨto' pʉra iyesi yau? To' uya apurɨto' pʉra iyesi uya Papa e'to' tʉusauro'sa' awɨrɨ pʉra ikupʉ?
E'tane nin, soisa amʉ' tonpa uya apuruka'pʉ iteire' airɨ suparari ke, mɨrɨpan yai mʉn mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tuna e'kwamʉ'pʉ.
Se serɨ apiyontɨn nɨto' uya: Ɨtonpa kon i'nʉnkatɨ', ɨi'nʉnkasa' uya 'nokon na'ne' kasa.

Ɨpun kon pʉ'kʉ rɨ kʉ'tʉtʉu makoi ena', ɨri ku'to' ike pe, e'tane e'tʉtɨ' ru'ku Papa ena', kamoro uma'tan nɨto' apai uko'man nɨto' ya' iyera'tɨsa' kon pe; mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨpun kon pʉ'kʉ itʉtɨ' itena' ipoken e'nɨto' ku'to' ike pe.
E'tane urɨ'nokon kamoro to' kasa tenna'posan pen mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉuma'tasan pen, e'tane kamoro apurɨnin nan mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tepika'tɨsan iye'ton pe te'san.
Mɨrɨ kasa nin si tanporo Esuwerʉ amʉ' epika'tɨ mɨrɨ, iye'menukasa' na'ne' kasa: “Mo'kanin uye'to' oton Sayan winɨ; Papa pʉra e'nɨto' ra'tɨ iya Seko' piyapai.
Kamoro rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' uya rɨ marɨ Itepuru Sises mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ pu'kena' ton tʉ'ka'pʉ, kamoro uya rɨ marɨ ina enpa'ka'pʉ. Serɨ kupʉ to' uya esi Papa ewaruma pe, tanporon kon nɨ pɨ' ɨsɨ pe to' esi.
Ipɨ' rɨ te'ku'se umakoitan pɨ' uko'man nɨ yau i'nairon anʉnkapʉ tʉpo, mɨrɨ rupɨ makoi iwano' pe use'man nɨto' e'ku'sa' pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ,
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa uya ui'mʉ'sa'kasa' kon Kʉrai pokon pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uyaponontɨsa' iya 'nokon ipokon pe Epʉn pe te'sen pata yau, Kʉrai Sises yau,
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', akaisarɨ'nokon kasi ye' pe te'sen inonkatɨ', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'nairon pɨ' tʉusauro'sen pe tʉtonpa pokon pe, apʉne pʉra tikin nan ipun pʉ'kʉ pe e'nɨ'nokon wenai.
Mara rʉ'kwɨ rɨ to' weyu ke to' repa'pʉ ina uya pen, mɨrɨ yau i'nairon wakʉ itekare uko'manto' pe ɨpiyau'nokon.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', ka'pon ani yai tʉusauro'sen ɨpʉremato' pe iyesi tʉmaimu enpoikanin pe te'to' pe.
Mɨrɨ koro'tau, Saarʉ usakorotasa' uya, “Sises poitorʉ ton tʉ'ka uya,” ta'pʉ. Saarʉ utɨ'pʉ Papa ena' use'man nɨto' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru piya'
“Ɨpiya' si utɨ serɨ, e'tane serɨ ton ekama uya serɨ non po rɨ marɨ esi koro'tau, pori' pe e'to' eponin pe to' e'to' pe tʉyau'nokon.
E'tane epori'matɨ' Kʉrai ekota'mato' yau rɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ', mɨrɨ pɨ' mɨrɨ entai ɨyepori'ma kon pa eke pe iku'to' usenpoika a'tai.
Mɨrɨ yau, tu'kan kon nɨ ti'tui' pʉra rɨ ene amʉ', ɨkʉi amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri ton nɨ toron amʉ' rɨ ene'pʉ uya.
E'tane serɨ pe tanporo se ton inonkatɨ': sakoro, a'ne' pe ɨwe'to' kon, e'wɨpai ɨwe'to' kon, kasi pe ɨtonpa kon pantomʉ'tɨto' auya'nokon, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri pe te'sen main inonkatɨ'.
Tʉkasa ta'porin ton ka'pɨ'nin pe to' esi wenai, to' piyau e'tʉrawasoman pɨ' iko'mamʉ'pʉ.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', makoi kʉse'nin tʉuma'tasen ɨpun kon esa' pe ɨri i'se iye'to' awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pa.
Itepuru Sises Kʉrai ese' yau serɨ kasa tʉuko'mansan auro'ka ina uya ipan pe, e'tʉrawasoman pɨ' to' e'to' pe ti'kiyari kon eporo pɨ', ka'pon amʉ' tanpokʉmai' pʉra.
“Isose' esi'pʉ to' tonpa pe. Irunan nɨ ɨkɨnta'pʉ Isose' pɨ', mɨrɨpan kon uya ikʉrʉpo'poma'pʉ Isi' yawon kon poitorʉ pe. E'tane Papa esi'pʉ iya'kɨrɨ,

Tikin nɨ to' tonpa, Akapas itese', e'mʉ'sa'ka'pʉ asauro'se'na. Papa A'kwarʉ uya tauro'kato' awɨrɨ ekama'pʉ iya to' pɨ', “Eke iwankan uta'mo'kan pɨ' man tanporo pata emʉ' kaisa rɨ,” ta'pʉ iya. (Serɨ e'kupʉ'pʉ Kʉrautiyas esi a'tai Ron o'no te'san pata ton epuru pe.)
Serɨ ta tʉpo, iye'sekunka'pʉ tanporon kon pokon pe iyɨpʉrema'pʉ.
Kamoro Kʉrai Sises iwano' pe te'san uya kurusu' pona ti'naino kon ɨri eseru, ɨri pe e'pai te'to' kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ekumapai te'to' kon pokapɨtʉ'pʉ kurusu' pona.
Utonpa ton, pori' pe kuru e'tɨ', tu'kan nɨ ɨ'si'taino ton i'tupɨ'nɨto' uye'sa' a'tai ɨpona'nokon,
Iyamʉtʉ pe e'nɨ ta yau e'tane ewarupɨ yau rɨ ɨtɨi'ma, kasi pe rɨ e'nɨ, i'napairon yau ɨko'mamʉi'ma pʉra rɨ.
Ka' uta'kokasa' ene'pʉ iya. Kareku waraino u'tɨ non pona a'kwa' kasa ewa'tɨsa' asakɨrɨ'nan si'na' ke itekun enne'pɨ'ne ene'pʉ iya.
Tʉron kon sa'ne uye'pɨ'sa' man ko, Pa'tiya winɨpai, Metiya winɨpai, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Eran winɨpai, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉron kon kanan Me'sa'po'temiya, Isutiya, Ka'pato'siya, Pontas, Eisa Mʉre'pʉ,

Ina ɨpʉrema serɨ pɨ' ɨuko'mamʉ kon pa Itepuru enu yau wakʉ pe te'sen uko'man nɨto' yau, mɨrɨpan pori'manin pe ɨwesi kon pa tanporon yau rɨ, tanporon yau rɨ wakʉ tʉrawaso yau epetan pɨ' Papa i'tuto' yau usemo'kan pɨ',
Mooi, Temu'ti, se iku'kɨ ta uya ɨpɨ' pu'kena' pe te'san usaurokʉ'pʉ ɨpɨ' awɨrɨ, ipɨkɨrɨ ɨwesi eto'to' pe wakʉ pe eto'nɨto' yau,
Serɨ e'ma'pʉ pe, eke anpisin ka'pon amʉ' maimu waraino eta'pʉ uya Epʉn po, se kasa tawon: “Areruya! Epika'tɨn nɨto', eke pe iku'to' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ meruntɨ esi Papa iwano' pe,
Ɨmɨrɨ'nokon si, iyeri'sa' pe iye'sa' rʉ'san main yawɨrɨ pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ amakooi kon yau,
Itepuru kokʉʉi yawon ensii'ma, ɨri ton kokʉ yawon nɨ nɨrɨ ensi auya'nokon pʉra iyesi; asa'rɨ rɨ marɨ Itepuru tepʉrʉʉi mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri ton tepʉrʉʉi po ɨwe'to' kon pʉra iyesi.
E'tane ɨ'koro'tau'nokon ekuman eseru rɨ kʉse'se'sa'pɨ'nin, mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri rɨ, mɨrɨ pe pʉra mentai e'nɨto', apʉne pʉra serɨ ton esi ipoken pʉra rɨ wakʉ ton Papa munkɨ amʉ' iwano' pe.

Esukenan kon pona, tanporon nɨ esi esuken, e'tane kamoro ɨri nʉma'tanʉkʉ'san mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apurɨnin nan pen, ɨ'rɨ esukenan pʉra rɨ iyesi to' pona. I'nai rɨ, asa'rɨ rɨ to' usenuminkato' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' ewan ma'tanʉ'sa' ɨri uya.

Tanporo etanin nan usewansiuka'pʉ, “Pʉse rɨ pen pe' pʉse, Surusiran pon kon kʉrɨ rɨ ese' pokon kon tʉ'kataine' pen? Iye'sa' kanan pen pe' se, kamoro a'sipɨ'se'na, mɨrɨpan kon ase'na use'man nɨto' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru ena'?” ta'pʉ to' uya.

E'tane Sises tʉrawasooi ineporo'pʉ esi eke pe Mosi' tʉrawasooi entai, wakʉ kuru ekonekan nɨsa' Papa winon eposa' iya tʉntʉton eke pe penaro' entai, mɨrɨpan e'tʉsa' wakʉ ton kuru nin e'ku'to' pɨ' isauro'sa' po.
Apʉne pʉra urɨ pona, uko'man nɨ pe Kʉrai esi, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eri'nɨ esi eporo pe.
serɨ i'tu uya pɨ' kuru rɨ, kʉrɨ wakʉ tʉrawaso piya'tɨnin nʉ'pʉ ayau'nokon uya ikupʉ iu'matʉ pʉ'kʉ pona, Sises Kʉrai uyepʉ weyu pʉ'kʉ pona.

I'tu'nokon nɨ nɨrɨ Papa Mumu uyee'pʉ, mɨrɨpan uya ito'ka'nʉ'to' ike ke repan nɨsa', i'napai rɨ tesi i'tuto' pe. Mɨrɨpan kʉrɨ rɨ i'napai rɨ te'sen iyau e'nɨ—imu rɨ Sises Kʉrai yau. I'napairɨ rɨ Papa pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto' pe iyesi.
Ikupʉ poken iyesi yau, ɨiwano' kon pe ɨwe'to' kon awɨrɨ, ɨko'mantɨ' ɨsɨ pe pʉra tanporon kon pokon pe.
Uta'sinpai'nokon pana' pe e'ku'nɨto' unekamanʉ kon pɨ', apʉne pʉra isauro'sa' rɨ esi tʉusaurokʉ'pʉ awɨron pe rɨ.
Tʉusewankamai' pʉra ɨwe'to' kon nɨmɨ uya serɨ ɨpiyau'nokon; uiwano' pe te'sen tʉrʉ uya ɨyena'nokon. Serɨ non nʉtʉyai'ne' kasa itʉrʉ uya pen. Kɨsewankamatʉu, kenari'nʉntʉu.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', uyenu kon yawon kon nɨ urɨ'nokon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'tu'nokon upun kon yau e'nɨ'nokon a'tai, Itepuru piyau pʉra rɨ e'nɨ'nokon.
“Kʉrɨ nin ka'pon umaimu eta pɨ' na'ne' e'tane, ikupʉ iya pʉra na'ne', iteseru aimenka uya pen nɨ, apʉne pʉra pata eseru aimenkai' uye'sa' pen, e'tane ipika'tɨi'.
Keen kasa pʉra e'tɨ', ɨri pe te'sen iwano', mɨrɨpan uya takon wɨnɨ'pʉ. Ɨ'rɨ pe iyesi pɨ' takon wɨnɨ'pʉ iya? Apʉne pʉra ɨri pe tʉnkupʉnʉ esi pɨ', ipokena' pe takon nʉkupʉnʉ e'tane.
Tanporon nɨ opa'wʉ amʉ' pʉra iyena'pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wʉ' amʉ' pʉra iyena'pʉ.

Mɨrɨ kasa si pʉse rɨ tikin nan nɨ ka'pon apai, iyeri'sa' pe rɨ te'sen apai rɨ, tu'ke rɨ ipayan ton e'seporo'pʉ mɨrɨ, itu'kanoro i'tu poken pʉra rɨ, sirikɨ amʉ' ka' awon kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wɨ'sɨ' parau e'pi pon kasa rɨ.
Serɨ si kin inkero', teri'sen pen, tʉusensen pen, tikin nan nɨ Papa, iwano' pe inamato' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke pe kuru iku'to' nesii, tɨwɨrɨ rɨ. Amen.

Eke pe isaurokʉ'pʉ, “Papa inamatɨ', eke pe iye'to' apurɨpɨ'tɨ', ka'pon amʉ' eseru aimenkato' iya e'seposa' man, apurɨtɨ'. Kʉrɨ rɨ apurɨpɨ'tɨ' Epʉn, non, parau mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ non yai tepa'kasen tuna konekanin nʉ'pʉ,” ta'pʉ iya.

Mɨrɨ a'tai, tu'ke rɨ Sises apurɨnin nan tu'kanoro epirikʉ'pʉ. Kiri' pe tʉusauro'san Esuwerʉ amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ patawon amʉ' Esuwerʉ amʉ' pokon pe to' e'manenpato' esi'pʉ, kiyari ke tʉtonpa kon uri'sami'si amʉ' itaan'pʉ ima'tasa' kon ɨnɨ to' uya pɨ'.
Serɨ pona ɨkɨ'masa' kon mɨrɨ, apʉne pʉra Kʉrai uya e'ne' moronka'pʉ ɨiwano' kon pe, ento' auya'nokon ipɨ' tʉnonkai', ite'ma'pʉ poro ɨutɨ kon pa.
Ɨpiyau'nokon ina esi a'tai main tʉtai ina, “Ka'pon e'tʉrawasoma pʉra iyesi yau kʉsenta'nanin,” tawon.
“Ipan pe serɨ non pon kon i'nʉnka tʉuya wenai, Papa uya tikin nan kuru tʉmu tʉrʉ'pʉ tanporo apurɨnin nan pe te'san uma'ta namai', e'tane tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto' epoto' pe to' uya.
E'tane, makoi a'kwarʉ uya to' maimu eikʉ'pʉ, “Sises si'tuyai', Paarʉ nɨrɨ si'tuyai', e'tane ɨnʉ' yan ken ɨmɨrɨ'nokon?” tukai'.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, ene, kin amʉ' non pon kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' soisaai amʉ' amʉrasa' ene'pʉ uya, kaware pon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ isoisaai amʉ' ewa'nomase'na.

Kanau epotorʉ'pʉ ya' ina ekanwa'tɨ'pʉ pata Atʉrami'tiyan, Eisa awon apai. Kanau tʉutɨsen pe te'sen ereutapɨtʉ'pʉ Eisa awo'nan tʉron nɨ ton nɨ pata ton yau. Aresta'kos, Sises apurɨnin Tesaroni'ka winon esi'pʉ ina tonpa pe, Ma'sitoniya apaino.
Pariki'si ta' a'sisa' kon tʉku'se ɨyenu kon yau, to' pokon pe rɨ a'sisa' pe ɨwesi kon pe te'ku'se, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kamoro ɨsɨ pe tʉkota'masan, ɨmɨrɨ'nokon nɨ ekota'ma pe.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨ'rɨ rɨ kupʉ auya'nokon a'tai, amaimu kon ke, ɨyemiya kon ke, tanporo iku'tɨ' Itepuru Sises ese' yau, tenki tai'ma Papa, Ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ' Kʉrai poro rɨ.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ tenupato' anʉnnin main yau esi a'tai, tɨwɨ tanporo wakʉ ton pe te'sen ekamʉi tenupanin ena'.

E'tane intʉrʉnʉ pe te'sen itimamin tʉsa' iya pʉra iyesi'pʉ, e'tane Papa usaurokʉ'pʉ iku'to' pe uya tukai', ‘Ɨmɨrɨ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apayan nʉ'san, Esuwerʉ amʉ' uya non epoto' oton.’ Mɨrɨ a'tai, imʉre pʉra Epʉra'an esi'pʉ.
Kʉrɨ rɨ e'kupʉ'pʉ to' wanmʉra ɨri pe to' ma'tanʉkʉ pɨ', urɨ'nokon tamokori ton kota'ma'pʉ to' uya. To' apiyo'ma'pʉ to' uya tentusan mʉre amʉ' eno'mato' pe to' uya, to' uma'tato' pe.
Mɨrɨ pɨ' si Pi'ta mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ ton e'sara'tɨ'pʉ tɨ' akasa' uruwai' pe pona utɨn pɨ'.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', wakʉ pe uyewan kupʉ i'se te'sen urɨ Papa winɨkʉi' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ka'pon amʉ' winɨkʉi' nɨrɨ.
Parau pon ɨsɨ sipa'sipa pe to' esi, to' ɨpiyɨ'to' a'koronta; sirikɨ amʉ' tʉutano'ma kon pe tʉupininsan, to' iwano' pe ipan nɨ ewarupɨ ekonekasa' tɨwɨro' pe rɨ.
Ka'pon winɨ uneporo'pʉ pen nɨ, mɨrɨ pe pʉra uyenupasa' rʉ'pʉ ipɨ' pen nɨ; e'tane ru'ku, Sises Kʉrai uya enpoika winɨ uneporo'pʉ.
Apʉne pʉra u'naino kon umakooi kon esi a'tai uyesa' kon pe, ɨri ɨnku'pai e'nɨto' upakasa' main winɨ esi'pʉ e'tʉrawasoman pɨ' upun kon yau, mɨrɨ si epetan nɨ'pʉ uma'tan nɨto' iwano' pe.

Serɨ ku'nin pe rɨ anʉnsa' rʉ'pʉ urɨ main anin pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itekare ekamai' enno'sa' pe—i'nairon ekama uya serɨ, kasi pe esi pen—mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'nai rɨ apurɨto' ti'saai pe e'to' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen iwano' pe.
Kamoro apiyontɨn nɨto' iya awɨron kon uko'mamʉ mɨrɨ iyau, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' yau nɨrɨ iko'mamʉ. Serɨ winɨ i'tu mɨrɨ uyau'nokon iyesi tukai': I'tu'nokon Iya'kwarʉ uyena'nokon intʉrʉ'pʉ winɨ.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ wakʉ pe tiwano' pe te'to' eporo i'se kʉse'nin, e'tane wakʉ tʉron kon iwano'.
Wakʉ pe ɨseseru yau tʉko'mansan pe e'tɨ'. Mɨ pe te'ku'san pe pʉra e'tɨ', e'tane se pe te'san pokon pe te'san pe e'tɨ'. Tʉutaperʉkasan pe pʉra e'tɨ'.
Ɨri pe ɨtonpa kon pɨ' ɨwe'to' kon inonkatɨ', ewe'toi'pɨ'to' kon, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ sakoro, e'sa'morʉpɨ'nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri pe ka'pon pɨ' usauro'nɨto', tanporon nɨ ɨri pe e'pai e'nɨto' pokon pe rɨ.
Ipoitorʉ pe enasa' man, Papa nʉtʉrʉ'pʉ unkupʉnʉ pe uyena' winɨ, ɨyena'nokon itʉto' pe uya imaimu tanporo iye'to' awɨrɨ—
I'pai i'po' esi'pʉ aimu'ne karimeru i'po' kasa mɨrɨ pe pʉra sino tato' kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itenu amʉ' e'werouwerouma'pʉ apo' kasa.
Tanporo serɨ esi ɨiwano' kon pe rɨ, wakʉ nonkasa' uya miyarɨ rɨ ka'pon amʉ' eporo uya, uya tenki tato' ku'to' pe eke pe itentai, eke pe Papa ku'to' iwano' pe.
Upun pɨ' tʉuta're'tɨsen nɨ, umʉnʉ ensinin nɨ uko'mamʉ mɨrɨ uyau, iyau nɨrɨ uko'mamʉ.
“Ewai', uyepuru, sapurɨyai' Kʉrai pe ɨwesi, Papa Mumu pe tʉuye'ton serɨ non pona, tasa' rʉ'pʉ,” ta'pʉ iya.
Inke rɨ tenupato' kon awɨrɨ kuru rɨ to' e'pɨtʉ'pʉ, tʉusi'nʉnka kon ke to' amʉrapɨtʉ'pʉ, to' uta're'tɨpɨtʉ'pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' ɨpʉremapɨtʉ'pʉ a'samʉtʉ yau.

Ipoken e'nɨto' i'nʉnkasa' auya, ipoken pʉra e'nɨto' ewaruma'tɨsa' auya; mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', Papa, itese' pɨ' ɨwe'to' uya ɨku'sa' ɨtonpa ton epoi, ɨmɨrɨ tʉkarapaimai' pori' pe ɨwesi ekamanin pe,” ta iya.
Era' uya soisa apiyo'ma'pʉ Isens, Isaan rui wɨto' pe iya supara ke.
Papa uya tasa' pen nɨ pɨ' usauro'nɨto' yau kesii, apʉne pʉra kamo iyau te'san ena mɨrɨ miyarɨ rɨ Papa uya tasa' pen nɨ awɨrɨ.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ tʉtonpa ewaruma'tɨnin esi mɨrɨ te'wɨsen pe rɨ, i'tu auya'nokon te'wɨsen pe te'sen yau inke uko'man nɨto' pʉra rɨ iyesi.

Tenta'na kon e'nonkasa' a'tai, Sises uya ta'pʉ Saiman Pi'ta pɨ', “Saiman, Isaan mumu, ui'nʉnka auya kuru rɨ pe' pʉsamo entai?” ta'pʉ iya. “Ewai', uyepuru, ɨi'nʉnka uya rɨ i'tu auya,” ta'pʉ Pi'ta uya. Sises uya ta'pʉ ipɨ', “Uikʉn non karimeru munkɨ amʉ' ken si ewe'kɨ,” ta'pʉ iya ipɨ'.
Tikin nan ena' iye'tʉsa' Iya'kwarʉ winɨ pu'kena' pe isauro'to' pe, tʉron nɨ ena' mɨrɨ rɨ Iya'kwarʉ uya itʉsa' isauro'to' pe i'tunin ye' pe,
Iyakon ite'kwa pe to' utɨsa' a'tai, Isose' usekama'pʉ tʉrui ton pɨ'. Mɨrɨ a'tai si, Peero uya Isose' tonpa ton i'tu'pʉ mɨrɨ.
Apʉne pʉra, “Ɨnʉ' rɨ uko'man nɨto' i'nʉnkanin, wakʉ pe ɨko'manpaino tani enkurunpai ɨri apai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉnta, enku'tɨnin pɨ' isaurokʉ namai'.
Sises apurɨnin nan esi'pʉ tikin nɨ rɨ isenuminkato', tikin nɨ rɨ itewan. Ɨnʉ' uya rɨ uiwano' serɨ ta pʉra rɨ, e'tane tiwano' kon ke rɨ te'repasan pe to' esi'pʉ.
Uneporo'pʉ nɨ'kwɨrɨ'nʉkʉ uya mɨrɨ ɨyena'nokon usennakan pe pʉra kuru iyesi pɨ': Kʉrai erikʉ'pʉ umakooi kon wenai, iye'menukasa' itekare na'ne' awɨrɨ,
Paperan po pu'kena' amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wakʉ ton, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tanporo non po iwɨsa' kon mʉnʉ e'seporo'pʉ,” ta'pʉ iya.
Mɨrɨ eta Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen uya a'tai, to' epori'ma'pʉ, Papa Maimu nama'pʉ to' uya. Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen, Papa nanʉmʉ'san tʉpiyau to' e'to' pe uya Sises ekareei apurɨ'pʉ.
Tanporo serɨ ton ekamanin nʉ'pʉ uya, “I'napai rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ; serɨ pe kuru uye'ai',” ta. Amen. Ɨsi'kɨ, Itepuru Sises.

Ɨ'rɨ rɨ uwinɨpai ɨusenupa'pʉ kon pɨ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra ananʉmʉ'pʉ kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨneta'pʉ kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨnene'pʉ kon uyau—iku'tɨ' si. Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ nin si Papa usewankaman nɨto' pʉn nɨ e'to' pe ɨpiyau'nokon.
E'tane rɨken ɨyeyaton kon pe kʉ'ku'tʉu, e'tane ru'ku ipanamatɨ' rɨken ɨtonpa kon panamato' auya'nokon kasa rɨ.
Tense e'tɨ', ɨnʉ' rɨ aya'sitɨ'nin a'ta rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ enku'tɨnin nɨ enupan nɨto' ike ke, ka'pon eseru erupa' rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ serɨ non nɨ uko'manto' eseru pɨ' te'sen, Kʉrai pɨ' pʉra rɨ.
teposen ekare pɨ' uta'kwarʉka epoto' pe uya, Papa uya ukɨ'masa' na'ne' ipona Epʉn winɨkʉi' Kʉrai Sises awɨrɨ.
iye'tʉsa' rʉ'pʉ tiwa rɨ uye'manin kon pe tanporon ɨri ton apai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ukorʉkato' kon pe tʉuya tiwano' ton pe ka'pon amʉ' itiwano' ton kuru, wakʉ ɨnku'pai kuru te'san.

“I'napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ'nokon: Ɨnʉ' uya rɨ umaimu eta a'tai, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uyenno'nin nʉ'pʉ apurɨ a'tai, kʉrɨ rɨ uya tɨwɨrɨ uko'man nɨto' eposa' mɨrɨ. Iteseru aimenkato' oton pen nɨ, iye'kwɨrɨ'ka'sa' pe rɨ iyesi uma'tan nɨto' apai uko'man nɨto' ya'.
Inserʉ, uyauro'kanin nʉ'pʉ enau yʉi korʉ pun konekasa' esi'pʉ pata i'tuto' ike, imʉra'taai ton, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iwekupiri ton.
To' utɨto' ya' esi uma'tan nɨto', to' e'to' itese' pɨ' esi to' ewan, to' e'to' eke pe esi to' epiyɨ'to' yau. To' usenuminkato' esi non eseru pɨ' rɨ.
Emen nɨ iyekonekasa' pe kʉse'nin, mɨrɨ pe iyesi a'tai, itaperʉka esi, mɨrɨpan uta'mo'ka mɨrɨ rɨ eseru aimenkato' o'koi' makoi kasa.

Utonpa ton nʉ'kwɨ, ɨmenukapai'nokon esa' e'tane, ina nekamanʉ epika'tɨn nɨto' ekareei pɨ', ɨmenukato' kon pe uya kuru e'kupʉ'pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ipan pe kuru ɨyekama'po kon pe apurɨto' Kʉri'san pe e'nɨ pɨ' wenai ɨyetokʉ kon pa Papa nʉtʉrʉ'pʉ tikin nan parɨ rɨ, tʉusensimaton pe pʉra rɨ wakʉ ton ena'.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, to' usakorota'pʉ se kasa iyesi pɨ', asa'ron kon enno'sa' kon uya ka'pon amʉ' enupa esi'pʉ Sises e'mʉ'sa'ka'pʉ pɨ' teri'sa' apai. Serɨ enta', iyeri'sa' kon e'mʉ'sa'ka ekamanin pe.
Apʉne pʉra imakooi uka'putasa' man ka' tepose, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa uya ɨri ton iteseru kupʉ tenu yau.
Serɨ rɨken pe Sises uya Kena, Kiyarari airon ka'kʉranpa'pʉ, tuna koneka'pʉ tʉuya yau waain pe. Mɨrɨ yau, ka'pon, kin poitorʉ pe te'sen esi'pʉ, takuru'kenan imu Ka'paneyan po.
Emiya'ne' pe ke'tʉu, e'tane ɨnku'paino ye' pe kuru aya'kwarʉ kon ke, Itepuru apiyo' ton pe e'tɨ'.
Ensa' auya'nokon pʉra rɨ iye'tane, i'nʉnka auya'nokon; ensa' auya'nokon pʉra rɨ iye'tane serɨ pe, apurɨ auya'nokon, mɨrɨ pɨ' si ipan pe pori' pe ɨwesi kon, eke pe rɨ, ekama poken pʉra rɨ,
Iyau uko'man nɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uyau'nokon iyesi i'tu'nokon, apʉne pʉra Ta'kwarʉ ke repanɨsa' iya.
Moro iyesi'pʉ mɨrɨ yau wai yawon waain peneka, mɨrɨpan ka' su'pa tʉki'se, iyʉi i'so'pu ye' pɨ' to' uya inta na' itʉrʉ'pʉ.
Apʉne pʉra ewarupɨ meruntɨrʉ apai umo'kasa' iya 'nokon, mɨrɨpan uya une'sa' kon tʉmu, tʉni'nʉnkanʉ e'to' esa' wannɨ pe ya',

Ɨyekama'po uya 'nokon kuru, utonpa ton, kamo e'ta'nʉ'nɨ emapu'tɨnin nan enei'ma ɨwesi kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨye'mata'nokon awa'kʉ'nin kon tʉnin nan. To' nʉkupʉnʉ esi ɨusenupa'pʉ kon ipɨ' kasa pʉra rɨ. To' piyau ke'tʉu.
Apiyo' pe iyesi yau, tɨwɨ apiyo' pe nesii; enupanin pe iyesi yau, tɨwɨ enupan pɨ' nesii;
Mɨrɨ wʉi a'tai, ɨ'rɨ pɨ' rɨ uyekama'po auya'nokon pen nɨ mɨrɨ. I'napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ'nokon; ukʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ ɨrepa kon uyese' yau ɨnekama'po'pʉ kon ke.

Pata wekupiri apon a'kʉ'tɨsa' esi'pʉ ɨ'si'tai rɨ epe'kena' ton tɨ' amʉ' ke. Wapiyaro' kuru iyapon esi'pʉ tɨ' isaspa tato', isakon esi'pʉ tɨ' sa'paya tato', itosorʉwano esi'pʉ tɨ' isarʉ'setoni tato', itasakɨrɨ'pano esi'pʉ tɨ' emɨrarʉ tato',
Ɨnʉ' rɨ, wakʉ tʉnkupʉnʉ i'tunin, ikupʉ iya pʉra na'ne' umakoita mɨrɨ.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, main useta'pʉ apono' winɨpai, se kasa tawon: “Papa, itese' pɨ' e'nɨto' apurɨpɨ'tɨ' tanporon kon ipoitorʉ ton, ɨmɨrɨ'nokon inamanin nan, aiko ton mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke ton!” tawon.
Mɨrɨ koro'tau rɨ, a'nʉn nɨ pɨ' e'nɨ, Epʉn pon uiwʉ' kon ke upontɨkapʉ kon i'se,
Tɨwɨ ka'pon teseru i'tui. Mɨrɨ tʉpo, mɨ pe te'ku'to' pe, tʉron nɨ pokon pe tʉusi'tui' pʉra,

Ɨnʉ' rɨ usenuminka pe iyesi yau wakʉ pe pʉra rɨ a'pɨ'pʉn uri'san imari'mato' pe tʉuya tʉnkupʉ'pʉ pɨ', mɨrɨpan uno'somankapʉ yau mɨrɨpan mari'makapʉ ta tʉuya yau, tɨwɨ nʉkupʉi i'se te'to' pe. Imakoita pen nɨ mɨrɨ. Tɨwɨ to' nemari'mai.
To' uya ɨyenpa'kato' oton kon usenupan nɨto' iwʉ' tapai; i'napai rɨ iweyu uye'kapʉ, ɨwɨnin kon e'ku'to' oton wakʉ kupʉ tʉuya pe tekamai' Papa iwano' pe.

Tʉron nɨ i'tuto' ipɨkɨrɨ ene'pʉ uya ka' yau, eke, a'kwarʉpɨ'nin nɨ: 7 kaisaron kon inserʉ amʉ' esi'pʉ 7 kaisaron paran amʉ' u'matʉ esanon, apʉne pʉra Papa uya kota'man nɨto' u'ma'sa' ekamanin pe iyesi'pʉ.
Sises uya imaimu eikʉ'pʉ, “Ipoken pʉra usauro'sa' pe iyesi yau, ekama'. E'tane i'napairon pɨ' usauro'sa' pe iyesi yau, ɨ'rɨ pe iyesi pɨ' uwɨnɨ auya?” ta'pʉ iya.

Ɨmɨrɨ, uisakon pe te'tʉrawasomasen ekama'po uya pʉsamoro uri'sami'si amʉ' ipika'tɨkɨ uya'kɨrɨ wakʉ itekare pɨ' ita'sisa' kon, Kʉremen pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉron kon e'tʉrawasoma tonpa ton, to' ese' e'menukapɨ'sa' na'ne' uko'man nɨto' karetaai pɨ'.
To' uya wakʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ pu'kena' amʉ' mʉnʉ ennoko'pʉ. Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', mʉn ensito' pe to' uya iku'sa' auya, tepe'pʉ kon eporo to' uya,” ta'pʉ iya.
Kane ku! Uko'man nɨto' ɨri yau eri'sa'; nai kasa iyau rɨ marɨ uko'man nɨ pɨ' e'nɨ?
Kʉrɨ rɨ ene moro iye'sa' rʉ'pʉ, e'tane ima'tasa' rʉ'pʉ esi mɨrɨ 8 pe kin amʉ' ku'nin pe, mɨrɨpan esi wapiyaro' 7 pan kon tonpa, mɨrɨpan utɨto' oton ama'tase'na.

E'tane ɨ'rɨ ken nɨkayan imenukasa' itekare? “Uri'san poitorʉ pe te'sen mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ imʉre inonkakɨ, apʉne pʉra poitorʉ pe te'sen mʉre uya ɨnʉ' enawon pen mʉre pokon pe inonkasa' rʉ'pʉ anʉmʉ pen mɨrɨ,” tawon.

Ka'pon amʉ' ipʉrataaike' pe e'paino kon ena i'tupɨ'nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ mare ya' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tu'kan nɨ ɨri ton mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨsɨ ton i'se e'nɨto' ya' ka'pon ennasikanin ekota'man nɨto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uma'tan nɨto' ya'.

10 kaisaron iretʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ene meneine' uya tekumasen ewaruma'tɨto' oton, tanporo itiwano' mo'kato' oton to' uya, ipon pʉra to' uya iku'to' oton. To' uya anto' oton, mɨrɨpan ma'tanʉ'to' oton to' uya apo' ke.
E'tane kʉrɨ ka'pon Papa i'nʉnka pɨ' na'ne' i'tu Papa uya.
Ɨ'rɨ ken si? Ina ken pe' si Esuwerʉ amʉ' esi wakʉ ton pe? Parɨ pen nɨ! Ekamaka'sa'nokon nɨ mɨrɨ, Esuwerʉ amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen esi mɨrɨ ɨsi'kaisa rɨ makoi o'no.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, to' uya papa tato' pe ipɨ' ika'sa' koneka'pʉ paka mʉre kasa, tʉuse'mato' kon nee'pʉ to' uya ipiya', mɨrɨpan kon userenka'pʉ, to' umanumʉ'pʉ tʉnkoneka'pʉ kon nama tʉuya'nokon ekamanin pe.

Ka'pon amʉ' tonpa'san mɨrɨ paran nʉwɨnɨ'san pen era'tɨ pʉra iyesi'pʉ tʉnkoneka'pʉ kon piyapai. Makoi amʉ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ korʉ ka'sa', sirʉpa ka'sa', karukuri ka'sa', tɨ' ka'sa' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ yʉi konekasa' apurɨto' tʉuya'nokon ereutanʉkʉ to' uya pʉra iyesi'pʉ—ennin pen, etanin pen, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉusasen pen.
Mɨrɨ si'kɨrɨ Itepuru pɨ' enari'nʉn nɨ i'tu'nokon ke, ka'pon amʉ' nin si anra'tɨpai e'nɨ. E'nɨ na'ne'nokon esi tense rɨ Papa pona, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ e'ku'ai' tense rɨ nɨrɨ iyesi e'pai man ɨyewan kon yau.

Tanporo e'nɨ na'ne' kaisa rɨ uko'man nɨ'pʉ'nokon to' koro'tau pena a'tai, u'naino kon umakooi kon e'to' i'se kupʉ pɨ' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'se iye'to' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ isenuminkato' pɨkɨrɨ utɨn pɨ'. To' kasa rɨ, i'naino kota'man nɨto' iwano' pe e'nɨ'pʉ.
Miyarɨ rɨ Pi'ta usaurokʉ'pʉ to' emiya'pontɨnin pe, “Epika'tɨtɨ' ɨri ton serɨ a'taino kon piyapai,” ta'pʉ iya.
Apʉne pʉra ɨuko'mamʉ kon pe iyesi yau a'naino kon amakooi kon awɨrɨ, ɨyerikʉ kon; e'tane Iya'kwarʉ winɨ ipun nʉkupʉ'pʉ ipoken pʉra tʉsa' auya a'tai ima'tato' ya', ɨuko'mamʉ kon nɨ,
Imenukasa' itekare nɨkayai'ne' kasa, “Kʉrɨ apurɨ pɨ' na'ne' ɨpiyɨ'to' pʉra rɨ iyesi,” nɨkayai'ne'.
Wapiya, Papa pɨ' tenki ta uya Sises Kʉrai poro tanporo ɨmɨrɨ'nokon pɨ', apʉne pʉra apurɨto' auya'nokon usekare'tɨsa' tanporo non emʉ' kaisa rɨ.
Ina uya i'tu, utonpa ton, Papa ni'nʉnkanʉ ton, ayanʉnsa' iya 'nokon,
Tanporon entai, ɨtonpa kon ti'nʉnkai' ipan pe e'tɨ', apʉne pʉra usi'nʉnkan nɨto' uya tu'kan nɨ makoi nɨpontɨ.

Ina utɨto' pe I'tari pona tukai' iye'ku'sa' pe iyesi'pʉ a'tai, Paarʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉron kon a'sisa' kon nonka'pʉ to' uya soisa amʉ' epuru, Isuriyas itese' ena', “tamʉ' tawon kon Sisa Soisaai Amʉ',” tato' kon.

Mosi', Papa poitorʉ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ karimeru mʉre eremu pɨ' to' userenka esi'pʉ: “Itepuru Papa Meruntɨ pe kuru te'sen ye', eke pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ a'kwarʉpɨ'nin pe kuru Ɨnkupʉnʉ man. Kin, tʉpataron kon iwano', ipoken mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'napai rɨ ɨyeseru esi.
Mʉre amʉ' emen entusanon kasa esukenan iya'kwarʉ merʉ' i'se e'tɨ', ɨusemo'ka kon pa ɨyepika'tɨto' kon yau,

Mɨrɨ a'tai, main eta'pʉ uya Epʉn winɨpai, “Imenuka',” ta'pʉ iya, “Pori' pe kuru kamoro esi mɨrɨ serɨ tʉpo teri'ton kon Itepuru tʉrawasooi pe esii'ma.” “Ewai',” ta'pʉ Ita'kwarʉ uya, “Tʉumoronka'to' kon eposa' to' uya tʉtʉrawasooi kon apai, mɨrɨpan kon nʉkupʉ'pʉ utɨ to' pɨkɨrɨ,” ta'pʉ iya.

Wakʉ kuru esukenan mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ imaku'pɨ pʉn Papa pokon pe uko'man nɨto', Papa, ukʉipʉnʉ kon e'to' i'se esi se kasa: piyapaino kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itaan'pʉ ima'tasa' kon tʉmainanpai' to' usewankamato' yapai, ɨri serɨ non eseru uya tʉma'tanʉ'to' apai nɨrɨ te'mainanpa pe.
Apana'tɨ uya 'nokon serɨ ɨnʉ' uya rɨ wakʉ pe rɨ tʉusauro'se ɨyenku'tɨ kon namai'.

Mɨrɨ a'tai, tanporon kon nɨ Papa nʉkapʉ'san maimu eta'pʉ uya Epʉn po, non po, non o'no, parau kau, tanporon kon nɨ ka'tawon kon nɨ. To' userenka'pʉ: “Apono' po iyereutasa' na'ne' rɨ karimeru mʉre iwano' pe, apurɨpɨ'to', inamato', eke pe i'tuto' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ meruntɨ nesii, inke rɨ, inke rɨ!” tukai'.
Itisakon nʉ'pʉ uya tʉwaai turunpa'pʉ. Mɨrɨ a'tai, eke wʉ' waraino epo'tɨ apo' ke eno'ma'pʉ to' uya parau ka'. Ipʉ'kʉ pe rɨ, 1/3 e'to' airɨ parau ena'pʉ mʉn pe.

To' uya tʉpi'si'se enpa'ka'pʉ pata yapai, mɨrɨpan kon e'sara'tɨ'pʉ eke ton tɨ' ma'kɨrɨ pɨ' ipona, iwɨnɨ'pʉ to' uya. Ka'pon amʉ' iwɨnin nan uya tʉpon kon pʉro'pon kanka'pʉ, mɨrɨpan nonka'pʉ to' uya non pona moineri'pɨ, Saarʉ piyau.
Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kanan, “Itepuru apurɨpɨ'tɨ', tanporon kon Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apurɨpɨ'to' erenkatɨ', tanporon kon ka'pon amʉ',” tasa' iya.
Apʉne pʉra iwinɨpai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iporo mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itiwano' pe tanporon nɨ esi. Itiwano' pe eke pe iku'to' nesii, tɨwɨrɨ rɨ! Amen.
Mɨrɨ ema'sa' yau, Isaan uya Sises uyepʉ tekare pɨ' ene'pʉ, mɨrɨpan uya ta'pʉ, “Pʉse rɨ si Papa iwano' karimeru mʉre, non makooi mo'kanin!
Apurɨto' winɨ Reyapu, pʉrata pɨkɨrɨ tekumasen, wɨnɨ pʉra iyesi'pʉ, main awɨron kon pen pokon pe, apʉne pʉra, ama'ai non ense itɨsa' kon ereutanʉ'sa' iya pɨ'.
Ama' e' uyepʉ ama'mase'na rɨken, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iwɨse'na, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ima'tanʉ'se'na. Urɨ uye'sa' uko'man nɨto' epoto' pe to' uya, eke pe kuru nɨrɨ to' uya epoto' pe.
E'tane urɨ'nokon esi Epʉn pon kon pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ enuri'nɨ'nokon itenupɨkɨrɨ pika'tɨnin Itepuru Sises Kʉrai uyepʉ mɨrɨ winɨ,
Ɨtonpa kon si tanʉnse e'tɨ', Kʉrai uya ayanʉnsa' kon na'ne' kasa, Papa apurɨpɨ'to' ne'nin pe.

Pʉsamoro ka'pon amʉ' akɨ to' ekorʉkato' pe to' pokon pe mekorʉkai'. To' i'pai kiriri'pɨ'nin nan, to' ekorʉkasa' ekamanin pe, me'mai'. Mɨrɨ a'tai, tanporon kon uya i'tuto' pe i'napai rɨ pʉra rɨ ɨpɨ' usauro'nɨsa' na'ne' esi tukai', e'tane main pʉreme'nin pe pʉra rɨ ɨwesi tukai'.

Mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ itun pi'pɨ iputurʉkasa' kon kʉipʉnʉ pe rɨ marɨ iyesi, itun pi'pɨ iputurʉkasa' kon pe rɨken to' esi pen e'tane tʉutɨsan nɨ marɨ apurɨto' pʉta'pʉ awɨrɨ ukʉipʉnʉ kon Epʉra'an enau iye'sa' rʉ'pʉ itun pi'pɨ puturʉka rawɨrɨ.
I'tun nɨto' ike ke to' i'tu'pʉ to' uya, mɨrɨpan i'ki'ma tane to' uya ita'mo'ka'pʉ Ma'tayas winɨkʉi', mɨrɨpan Ma'tayas ena'pʉ 11 pan kon enno'sa' kon tonpa pe.
“Pori' pe kamo esi ɨri to' nʉkuu'pʉ pɨ' usentu'man nɨsa' kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ imakooi ton inɨpontɨsa' na'ne' nan.
Asa'ron kon uyekamanin nan esi mɨrɨ asa'ron are' e' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ asa'ron raan'pu amʉ', Itepuru, non esa' piyau te'san.
Aya'kwarʉ kon tainʉnpai' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉuta'kwarʉpɨ'se, tʉukɨ'pɨ'nʉnpɨ'se akarantɨ'. Auta'kɨrɨto' kon ensimatɨ' tʉuta'kwarʉpɨ'se ukaran nɨ pe, pori' pe ɨwe'to' kon ipan pe ɨusewankono'ma kon pe.
Utonpa rʉ'kwɨ, ɨri ɨnenenʉ kʉ'kupʉi, e'tane wakʉ rɨken iku'kɨ. Ɨnʉ' rɨ wakʉ ku'ai'ne' esi mɨrɨ Papa winon pe, ɨnʉ' rɨ ɨri ku'nin esi a'tai Papa ensa' iya pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ.

Mɨrɨpan uya tʉyun pi'pɨ puturʉkato' eporo'pʉ ento' ipɨ' pe, Papa uya anʉnsa' ipokena' pe enpoikanin pe apurɨto' iya winɨ, itun pi'pɨ puturʉkasa' pe pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi koro'tau. Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', tanporon kon apurɨnin nan kʉipʉnʉ pe iyesi e'tane itun pi'pɨ iputurʉkasa' kon pen, anʉnsa' kon tato' pe to' pɨ'.
apʉne pʉra iyeri'sa' pe na'ne' emo'kasa' makoi apai.
Tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ina pun esi Sises uma'ta'pʉ ekamanin ye' pe rɨ, iko'manto' usenpoikato' pe rɨ marɨ ina uko'manto' yau.
Tanporon kon nɨ nin esi tiwano' kon pɨ', Sises Kʉrai iwano' pɨ' pen nɨ nin.

Apurɨto' winɨ Epʉra'an, ipan pe kɨɨyi' pe kuru rɨ iyenasa' e'tane—mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Sera rɨ kanan e'tane umu'tan poken pʉra rɨ—to' rɨ umu'ta'pʉ, apʉne pʉra tʉusaurokʉ'pʉ awɨrɨ Papa esi tukai' apurɨ iya wenai.
Kʉrɨ uyenno'nin nʉ'pʉ esi se kupʉ uya i'se; kamo urepa'pʉ iya ike ton nonka uya i'se pʉra iyesi, e'tane tanporo to' i'mʉ'sa'kato' pe uya pata weyu u'ma'sa' a'tai.

e'tane nin si upona'nokon tikin nɨ rɨ Papa esi, Ikʉipʉnʉ, tanporon nɨ uye'sa' na'ne' iwinɨ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uko'man nɨ'nokon na'ne' itiwano' pe; mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tikin nan nɨ kanan Itepuru Sises Kʉrai, tanporon nɨ uye'sa' na'ne' iporo mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ uko'man nɨ'nokon na'ne' iporo.

E'tane Temu'ti si enna'posa' man serɨ pe kuru ina piya', ɨpiya'nokon tʉutɨ tʉpo, mɨrɨpan uya wakʉ pe rɨ Papa apurɨto' auya'nokon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨusi'nʉnkato' kon ekareei ne'sa' man. Ina pɨ' wakʉ pe ɨusenuminkapɨtʉ kon tukai' ina pɨ' ekamasa' iya man mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ina kanan ɨnenpai kuru ɨwesi kon, ina esi ɨyenpai'nokon kuru na'ne' kasa.
Mɨrɨpan si karimeru amʉ' pa'simanin nan epuru usenpoika a'tai, a'kwa ayarʉkooi kon, kʉron eporo auya'nokon mɨrɨ tenkɨ'sɨimu'nasen pen nɨ.
Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', mɨrɨ warai e'ku'nɨto' esi pɨ', ipan pe enari'mʉra e'nɨ.

E'tane pʉsamoro ka'pon amʉ' e'sapema tʉusaurokʉ kon yau tʉnto'ka'nʉkʉnʉ kon pen nɨ pɨ'. To' esi ene amʉ' kasa rɨ, ene amʉ' teseru awon kon, iyentusa' kon ta'sisan pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉma'tanʉ'san pe rɨken, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ene amʉ' kasa rɨ to' rɨ nɨrɨ uma'tato' oton.
Aiko tawon pe tesi pɨ' entu'manin nan pɨ' serɨ ta'pʉ iya pen nɨ, e'tane ama' e' pe tesi pɨ'. Pʉrata paikii esa' pe tesi koro'tau, iyawon enno'nin pe iye'pɨtʉ'pʉ i'se te'to' pɨ'.
I'tu'nokon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apurɨ Papa uya ui'nʉnkato' kon. Papa esi usi'nʉnkan. Ɨnʉ' rɨ uko'mamʉ a'tai usi'nʉnkan nɨto' yau, uko'mamʉ mɨrɨ Papa yau, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa nɨrɨ uko'mamʉ iyau.

Ka'pon amʉ' uya Si'tipʉn wɨnɨ'pʉ si'kɨrɨ, Sises apurɨnin nan apʉrʉmʉ'pʉ Surusiran apai tʉron nɨ pata ya'ne, apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ yawon kon ka'pon amʉ' uya tʉkota'ma kon pɨ'. Tʉron kon to' tonpa ton utɨ'pʉ Pini'siya pata ya', Sai'pʉras opa'wʉ pona, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Antiyo' pata ya'. To' uya Sises ekareei ekama esi'pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pɨ' rɨken mɨrɨ ton pata yau'ne.
E'tane Papa apurɨ pɨ' e'nɨto' pori' pe esii'ma itesa' pe e'nɨto' pɨ' esi eke pe rɨ eposa' pe.

Papa munkɨ amʉ' ewa'nomato' pe iya irepasa' esi'pʉ to' entai iye'to' pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ eke pe iye'to' ke irepasa' esi'pʉ tanporo rɨ irʉko' amʉ', tʉponaron kon, tʉmaimuron kon, tʉpataron kon epoi iye'to' pe.

E'tane iwenai apanta'mato' kon eporo auya'nokon yau, iye'to' pen nɨ ku'sa' auya'nokon pɨ' imoronka auya'nokon, ɨ'rɨ eporo auya'nokon? E'tane e'ne' moronka auya'nokon yau, wakʉ kupʉ auya'nokon wenai, imoronkatɨ' rɨ, serɨ pɨ' ayapurɨpɨtʉ kon mɨrɨ Papa piyau.

Serɨ wenai Kʉrai esi emenna' ekonekan nɨto' yau iporo e'nɨto' pe, kamoro si ikɨ'masa' kon uya iye'kupʉ tukai' auro'kasa' kon uya tʉtʉsen epoto' pe siyaro' rɨ—serɨ si tʉuma'tasa' pɨ' to' epe' pe to' mo'kanin pe makoi, to' nʉkupʉ'pʉ apai wapiyaro' ekonekan nɨto' o'noro esii'ma.
Ɨ'rɨ ken si ta'nokon serɨ, mɨrɨ a'tai? Umakoitan pɨ' rɨ e'nɨ'nokon, wakʉ nonkasa' epanto' pe?
Mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri pe rɨ usauro'nɨto', iya'kwarʉ pʉra rɨ usauro'nɨto' mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri pe te'sen main apurɨto', ipokena' pen nɨ, e'tane tenki tato' rɨken imaimu pe.

Mɨrɨ yau, enkɨ'sɨimu'nan kaware ene'pʉ uya urau. Ipo te'sen ese' esi'pʉ Eri'nɨto', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ekota'man nɨto', Etis itese' esi'pʉ ite'ma'pʉ winɨ, a'ko pe. 1/4 pe non esa' pe to' e'to' pe, to' kupʉ'pʉ to' uya tʉwɨsen pe to' e'to' pe supara ke, iwankan ke, paran ke, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ annin nan ene amʉ' ke.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', iku'to' pe uya tukai' usauro'nɨsa' uyepʉ apurɨto' winɨ, iye'ku'to' pe wakʉ nonkasa' winɨ, mɨrɨpan e'kupʉ mɨrɨ a'tai tanporo Epʉra'an munkɨ amʉ' pɨ'—kamoro rɨken main pɨ' te'san pen e'tane kamoro Epʉra'an uya apurɨto' pɨ' te'san nɨ marɨ. Tanporo ukʉipʉnʉ kon pe iyesi.
To' uya uyekama'popɨtʉ'pʉ tʉpo, unonkapai to' esi'pʉ, apʉne pʉra ɨri ku'sa' uya pʉra iyesi'pʉ uwɨto' ipɨkɨrɨ.
Mɨrɨ pɨ' si ka'pon e'to' i'se pɨ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra inkuu'pʉ pɨ' iyesi pen, e'tane Papa usentu'mato' pɨ' iyesi.
Ekumanpai'nokon pʉra, to' tonpa ton esi'pʉ kasa—mɨrɨpan kon uma'ta'pʉ 23,000 kaisa rɨ tikin nan wʉi yau.

e'tane tʉron nɨ main e'tʉrawasoma ene uya upun pʉ'kʉ ton yau, usenuminkato' iwano' main pokon pe usewa'noma kupʉ iya, mɨrɨpan uya ukoneka main iwano' makoi na'si'pʉ pe, te'tʉrawasomasen upun pʉ'kʉ ton yau.

Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ', e'sara'tɨn pe Kʉrai pɨ' usenupan nʉ'pʉ tʉnɨnse, iyakʉ'pʉsa' pe e'nɨto' ya' utɨnpai'nokon, iyapon pe kanan era'tɨn nɨto' uma'tan nɨto' ya' anin nʉkupʉnʉ tʉka'pai'nokon pʉra, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa apurɨto',
Ɨnʉ' rɨ kʉ'nurunpanin. Menno'tʉi' tewankamai' pʉra upiya' iye'to' pe. Itenupɨkɨrɨ e'ai' itonpa ton amʉ' pokon pe.
Wakʉ pe pe' iyesi, utonpa ton, ka'pon e'kupʉ yau apurɨto' esa' pe e'tane ɨ'rɨ rɨ kupʉi'ma pʉra? Mɨrɨ warai pe' apurɨto' uya ipika'tɨ?
Mɨrɨ a'tai, tʉron kon ka'pon amʉ' Surusiran pon kon usekama'po'pʉ, “Pʉse rɨ pen pe' iwɨnɨ i'se to' na'ne'?
Mɨrɨ tai'ma to' pona ise'netu'ka'pʉ, “Wakʉ A'kwarʉ anʉntɨ',” tai'ma.

To' uya Papa uya anʉn nɨto' ipoken e'nɨto' ya' ku'sa' se pe rɨ pɨ', mɨrɨpan kon e'warinpasa' tiwano' kon nɨ nin ipoken e'nɨto' ɨnkonekapai, to' e'tʉsa' pʉra iyesi Papa uya anʉn nɨto' ipoken e'nɨto' pe ya'.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ Papa Mumu apurɨnin ewan yau serɨ tekamasen esi. Ɨnʉ' rɨ Papa apurɨnin pen uya kasi ye' pe iku'sa' mɨrɨ, apʉne pʉra Papa nekama'pʉ apurɨsa' iya pʉra iyesi tʉmu pɨ' isauro'tane.

I'napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ'nokon, ɨnʉ' rɨ uyapurɨnin esi pe iyesi yau, kʉrɨ rɨ uya iku'to' oton mɨrɨ siku'ai'ne' rɨ. Mɨrɨ entaino kuru rɨ ku'to' iya oton siku'ai'ne' entai kuru rɨ, apʉne pʉra utɨ wenai ikʉipʉnʉ piya'.
Apiyo' ton pe te'san enupakɨ tesanon kon namanin nan pe to' e'to' pe tanporon yau rɨ, pori' pe to' ɨnku'paino kon pe, to' ei'pɨ'nin nan pe pʉra,
Tense e'tɨ' ɨnʉ' uya rɨ wakʉ nonkasa' Papa uya pʉremekʉ namai', mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ i'ne' mi' rɨ kʉsa'tanin ekamʉn ku'ton mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tu'kan kon ma'tanʉ'ton pe.
Wakʉ ku'nin ye' pe iye'to' pe iyesi itekare awon kon pen koro'tau, piyɨ'nʉ'nin ya' ita'mo'ka namai' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Makoi mareei ya'.
E'tane uiwano' kon pe e'nɨ na'ne' kaisa rɨ wakʉ nonkasa' e'tʉsa' upona'nokon Kʉrai uya iku'sa' na'ne' awɨrɨ.
Itisakon nʉ'pʉ uya ti'sawʉ yawon i'kwamʉ'pʉ parau ka'. Tuna era'tɨ'pʉ iyeri'sa' ka'pon mʉnʉ kasa, mɨrɨpan tanporo rɨ ikau te'san erikʉ'pʉ.
To' maimu awɨrɨ e'tɨ', to' uya ɨyenpɨ'tane'nokon nɨken pen wakʉ tato' pe to' uya ɨpɨ'nokon, e'tane Kʉrai apiyo' ton pe, Papa eseru kupʉ pɨ' ɨyewan kon apai.

E'tane iku'tɨ' ɨ'sɨ'mʉn yai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ tʉnamasen pe, wakʉ pe ɨyewan kon tʉkonekai', mɨrɨ a'tai kamo ɨri pe ɨku'pai'nokon na'ne' nan wakʉ ɨnkupʉnʉ kon Kʉrai yau pɨ' ɨpiyɨ'to' pe ɨri pe ɨpɨ'nokon tʉusauro'sa' kon pɨ'.
Ukʉipʉnʉ eseru esi tanporon kon imu ennin nʉ'san mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apurɨnin nʉ'san uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko'man nɨto' epoto' pe; to' i'mʉ'sa'kato' pe uya pata weyu u'ma'sa' a'tai,” ta'pʉ iya.

Inke pʉra Papa inserʉʉi uya eno'ma'pʉ non pona, apʉne pʉra ka'pon amʉ' uya tapurɨ i'se iyesi wenai mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa ru'ku inamatɨ' ta iya kasa pʉra. Mɨrɨpan anɨ'pʉ weruwe amʉ' uya, mɨrɨpan erikʉ'pʉ.
Urɨ'nokon epuru Sises Kʉrai, e'to' itese' pɨ' Papa mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Ikʉipʉnʉ, usentu'man nɨto' kʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Papa, tanporo a'kwarʉ ne'nin iwano' pe apurɨpɨ'to' nesii,
Tʉron kon utɨsa' serɨ ton piyapai, mɨrɨpan kon era'tɨsa' se pe rɨ usauro'nɨto' ya'.
Wakʉ itekare pɨ' ɨpiyɨtʉ pen nɨ, apʉne pʉra Papa meruntɨrʉ pe iyesi tanporon kon apurɨnin nan epika'tɨto' ike pe; wapiya Esuwerʉ iwano' pe, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ Esuwerʉ pen iwano' pe.
Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ' uya rɨ tʉron nɨ iyapon nonka poken pʉra iyesi inonkasa' na'ne' Sises Kʉrai, enta'.
Mɨrɨ nin si e'tane, akaisarɨ'nokon kuru ɨno'pʉ kon i'nʉnkato' auya'nokon pe iyesi mɨsi'nʉnkayatʉi'ne' kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ no'pʉ uya tʉtaan'pʉ namato' pe iyesi.

Iyeri'sa' pe ɨwesi kon koro'tau amakooi kon yau mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ipi'pɨ puturʉkasa' pen a'taino kasa amakooi kon yau ɨwe'tane'nokon, Papa uya nurɨne ɨkuu'pʉ kon Kʉrai pokon pe. Tanporo umakooi kon eno'ma'pʉ iya,
Ɨrepa'pʉ kʉseno'mai, ɨyena' itʉsa' pu'kena' maimu poro itepuru ton uya temiyatʉ kon nonkasa' a'taino rʉ'pʉ ɨpona.
Mɨrɨ a'tai, emenna' Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ emenna' non ene'pʉ uya. Wapiyaro' Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ wapiyaro' non pʉra iyena'pʉ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ parau pʉra rɨ iyesi'pʉ.
Pori' pe te'san pe e'tɨ' tɨwɨrɨ rɨ;
Mɨrɨ 5 kaisaron kapʉi koro'tau uma'tan nɨto' warinpato' oton ka'pon amʉ' uya, e'tane to' uya epoto' oton pen; eri'pai to' e'tane, uma'tan nɨto' utɨpɨ'to' oton to' piyapai.
Apurɨ'nokon Sises erikʉ'pʉ, mɨrɨpan kanan e'mʉ'sa'ka'pʉ; mɨrɨ pɨ' nin si apurɨ'nokon Papa uya ipokon pe kamo iye'nʉnsa' kon nʉ'san itese' pɨ' esii'ma ne'to' oton.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ Sises i'tuyai'ne' Papa Mu pe esi yau, Papa esi mɨrɨ iyau, kʉrɨ rɨ kanan esi Papa yau.
Ɨyenupa'pʉ kon, ɨuko'mamʉ'pʉ kon eseru pɨ', penaro' ɨyeseru kon nonka kon pa, ɨyenku'tɨpai'nokon te'sen pɨkɨrɨ ɨwesi kon nʉma'tanʉkʉ'pʉ;
Urɨ esi mʉra'ta pe, urɨ poro ɨnʉ' rɨ ewomʉ a'tai, iyepika'tɨ. Iyewomʉ, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ iyepa'ka nɨrɨ ti'kiyari pata'se' epose'na.

To' wɨnɨ'pʉ tɨ' ke; to' sara'mo'pʉ saka ke a'sa'mʉyai; supara ke to' wɨnɨ'pʉ. To' upinimʉ'pʉ karimeru mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ kapirita pi'pɨ ipon pe, entu'ma', ikota'masa' pe e'ne' pe mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri pe rɨ iku'sa' pe—
Ipokena' pe Sises esi tukai' i'tu auya'nokon yau, i'tu auya'nokon tanporon kon ipoken te'sen ku'nin nan esi imunkɨ pe.

Apʉne pʉra Papa uya ina apiyontɨsa' ina uya iku'to' pe, “‘To' weyu pe ɨyennoko uya 'nokon serɨ non emʉ' kaisaron kon ka'pon amʉ' pana'tɨse'na, to' pika'tɨnin pe urɨ esi pɨ',’ tukai',” ta'pʉ Paarʉ uya.

Ina uya mɨ airɨ tanporo ama'aino mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ɨri piyɨ'nʉ'nin nonkasa'; kasi awɨrɨ ina esi pen. Mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa Maimu kupʉ ina uya pen kasi ye' pe, mɨrɨ pe pʉra nin, i'nairon ekama pɨ' ina e'tʉsa' tanporon kon ka'pon amʉ' ewan ya' Papa enu yau.

Papa uya eke pe kuru ikupʉ'pʉ, mɨrɨpan ereutanʉ'sa' iya tenwo'netʉ winɨ, mɨrɨpan uya apiyo'ma'pʉ ta'kwarʉ enno'to' pe iya tʉpoitorʉ ton pona, tʉusaurokʉ'pʉ awɨrɨ rɨ. Sises uya si eke pe kuru rɨ ina repasa' Wakʉ A'kwarʉ ke menyatʉi'ne' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ metayatʉi'ne'.
mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ emenna' pata'tɨsa' auya'nokon, emenna' pe tenapɨ'sen i'tunin pe, tʉka'nin nʉ'pʉ kasa.
Sises uya mɨrɨ etasa' a'tai, ta'pʉ iya, “Serɨ paran uya eri'nʉ'ka pen nɨ, e'tane Papa meruntɨrʉ usenpoikato' pe, Papa Mumu apurɨto' pe ipɨkɨrɨ iyesi,” ta'pʉ iya.
Apʉne pʉra wakʉ itekare yau Papa uya anʉn nɨ ipokena' rɨ tukai' apurɨto' winɨ iyepiya'tɨ si'kɨrɨ iu'matʉ pona, iye'menukasa' na'ne' kasa: “Ipokena' awɨrɨ te'sen uko'mamʉ apurɨto' winɨ,” tawon.
Tiwarɨ rɨ tʉkurusukuui arɨi'ma itɨ'pʉ Pu'pɨ Ɨ'pʉ Rʉ'pʉ pata'se' ya' (Arami' pe Korʉko'ta tato' ya').
Ɨsi'tai repapɨ'nɨto' esi, wakʉ nonkasa' uyena'nokon awɨrɨ. Ka'pon repato' ike pe pu'kena' pe usauro'nɨto' esi yau, tɨwɨ napurɨi apurɨto' tʉuya yau iyesi kaisarɨ rɨ.
Wapiyaro' ene usene'pʉ rayan kasa, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ite'ma'pʉ winon esi'pʉ paka mʉre kasa, to' osorʉwano esi'pʉ ka'pon emʉ' ke, mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ to' asakɨrɨ'pano esi'pʉ imisimɨ arinta kasa.
Ti'tui' ɨko'mantɨ'—pu'pʉra pen e'tane pu'kena' pe,
Apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ' esi tʉron nɨ pe Esuwerʉ amʉ' pen kasa pʉra tato' pʉra rɨ iyesi—kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ epuru esi tanporon kon epuru pe, mɨrɨpan uya eke pe rɨ wakʉ tʉrʉ tanporon kon tesa'nin nan pona,
Kʉrai esi main, Mosi' winon u'ma'sa' pe rɨ, tanporon kon nɨ apurɨnin nan iwano' pe Papa uya anʉn nɨ ipokena' pe e'nɨto' ya'.
Ɨ'rɨ pɨ' rɨ kɨsewankamatʉu, e'tane tanporon yau rɨ, ɨwɨpʉrema kon mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ekama'po auya'nokon yau, ɨyepori'ma kon pe, ɨnesakʉnʉ kon itʉtɨ' Papa ena'.
Serɨ ton si e'kupʉ'pʉ ento' ipɨ' pe, ɨri ton pɨ' rɨ uyewan kon tʉrʉ namai' to' esi'pʉ kasa.
Iteuta a'koka iya a'tai, ikɨrɨsin epa'ka'pʉ iyapai, eke apo' epo'tɨto' en yapai ikɨrɨsin epa'ka kasa, wʉi enu mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ ka' ena'pʉ ewarupɨ pe iteuta kɨrɨsin ke.

mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ serɨ rupɨ yau ɨnʉ' rɨ tʉtonpa ku'nin ipoken pʉra mɨrɨ pe pʉra ipɨ' rɨ kʉ'sennakanin. Itepuru uya ka'pon amʉ' kota'ma mɨrɨ serɨ ton wenai, ina apana'tɨta'tʉine' mɨrɨ awonsi'kɨ apanamaka'ta'tʉine' kasa.
Ɨnʉ' rɨ esi yau Kʉrai iwano' pe, emenna' pe ika'sa' pe iyesi mɨrɨ; penaro' utɨ'pʉ, emenna' uye'sa'!
Ikʉipʉnʉ uya imu i'nʉnka, mɨrɨpan uya tanporon nɨ tʉnkupʉnʉ enpoika itena'. Serɨ entaino kuru rɨ enpoika iya mɨrɨ iku'to' pe iya, mɨrɨ uya ɨyewansiukato' oton kon.
Kʉrɨ ama' pe iye'pɨ'sa' rʉ'pʉ kʉse'nin ama' pe mɨrɨ enta', e'tane tɨwɨ ne'tʉrawasomai, ɨ'rɨ rɨ kupʉ pɨ' nesii temiyatʉ ke, kamoro entu'ma' na'ne' nan repanin pe te'to' pe.
Serɨ rɨken pe: Uiwʉ' oton iwa'kʉ'sa' ɨnkoneka', apʉne pʉra e'ku'to' man ɨpiya' enna'po ɨwɨpʉrema'pʉ kon ei'nin pe.

Ti'tui' pʉra rɨ ti'tupɨ'sen pen nɨ enupan nɨto' ayano'matɨ'nin. Wakʉ pe rɨ iyesi uyewan kon umeruntɨtato' pe wakʉ nonkasa' ke, kiyari rɨ pɨ' teseru ke e'nɨto' winɨ pen, ipɨ' tenta'nasan pika'tɨnin pen nɨ.
Serɨ si ina uya kanan ɨyekama'pokapʉ kon, ina tonpa ton, sa'man pe ɨ'koro'tau'nokon ne'tʉrawasomayai'ne' nan inamaka'tɨ', ɨyesanon kon pe na'ne' nan Itepuru yau, apanama kon pɨ' na'ne' nan.

Serɨ ta'pʉ isanon uya, apʉne pʉra enari'ke' to' esi'pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ' pɨ', apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ' e'ku'sa' esi'pʉ ɨnʉ' uya rɨ Kʉrai pe Sises esi tukai' ekamasa' a'tai, ipa'kato' pe iyesi usenupan nɨto' iwʉ' tapai tukai'.
